original: tenātmanā nīlasādhyārthakriyākāriṇā svabhāvena dṛṣṭam eva ālocanāpratyayena /
analyzed: tena ātmanā nīla sādhya artha kriyā kāriṇā svabhāvena dṛṣṭam eva ālocanā pratyayena

original: tato niṣpāditakriye karmaṇy aviśeṣādhāyi vikalpajñānaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt? /
analyzed: tatas niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi aviśeṣa ādhāyi vikalpa jñānam katham pramāṇam syāt

original: atha[150]matam -- sāmānyam eva tarhy adhigacchan nīlavikalpaḥ pramāṇam astu /
analyzed: sāmānyam eva tarhi adhigacchan nīla vikalpaḥ pramāṇam astu
tat ca sāmānyam arthakriyā kāri

original: yato nīlasādhyam evārthakriyāṃ nīlena saha sambhūya kariṣyati /
analyzed: yatas nīla sādhyam evā arthakriyām nīlena saha sambhūya kariṣyati

original: vyaktisvabhāvāny eva hi sāmanyānīty āha -- [S. 35b.] na ca naiva tat svalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino nīlavyaktidarśanottarakālaṃ bhavanaśīlasya
analyzed: vyakti svabhāvāni eva hi sāmanyāni iti āha s na ca na eva tat sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇa uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ nīla vyakti darśana uttara kālam bhavana śīlasya

original: liṅgagrahaṇottarakālabhāvinas tu pūrvoktena prakāreṇa vyaktisādhyārthakriyā sāmānyasya kalpitasya
analyzed: liṅga grahaṇa uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ tu pūrva uktena prakāreṇa vyakti sādhya artha kriyā sāmānyasya kalpitasya
vyavasthāpayitum śakyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: nīlavikalpasya[151] viṣayeṇa nīlasāmānyena [T. 228a.] nīlasādhyārthakriyā rañjanādikā kriyate /
analyzed: viṣayeṇa nīla sāmānyena nīla sādhya artha kriyā rañjana ādikā kriyate
tasya vyakti svābhāvya ayoge sati kalpita rūpasya tad asambhavāt

original: na ca nityasvabhāvatāmābibhrāṇena nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyā 'nyā vā 'rthakriyā kriyate /
analyzed: na ca nitya svabhāva tām ābibhrāṇena nīla vikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīla sādhyā nyā vā rthakriyā kriyate
krama yaugapadya virodhāt iti manyate

original: tad evaṃ nīlaṃ dṛṣṭvā nīlam iti jñāne pratibhāsamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ na kāñcid arthakriyām
analyzed: tat evam nīlam dṛṣṭvā nīlam iti jñāne pratibhāsamānam sāmānyam na kāñcid arthakriyām
upakalpayati iti prasādhya anartha kriyā kāri viṣayasya api vikalpasya pratyakṣa pṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ

original: prāmāṇyaprasaṅgād ativyāptir iti tatrāpūrvārthavijñānam iti [S. 36a.] pramāṇalaksaṇemīmāṃsakair
analyzed: prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt ativyāptiḥ iti tatra apūrva artha vijñānam iti

original: , arthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānā hi tathā sati syāt iti cet;

original: atha `ya evābhūtvā bhavanadharmā bhūtvā cābhavanadharmā 'sthirarūpo bhāvaḥ tatraiva kṛtakatvādayo dharmā vartante' iti vyavasthāpyate /

original: [T. 264b.] tato yad ekarūpatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ bhaveṣu tat pūrvottarakālayor janakājanakasvabhāvabhedavyavasthāpakapratyakṣanibandhanām anubhavadbādhāṃ  #
analyzed: t tatas yat eka rūpa tayā pratyabhijñānam bhaveṣu tat pūrva uttara kālayoḥ janaka ajanaka svabhāva bheda vyavasthāpaka pratyakṣa nibandhanām anubhavat bādhām

original: tatpratibhāsinaś cābhinnarūpasyālīkatve 'kṣasamudbhavām api vṛttim anubhavato 'sya satsamprayogajatvābhāvāt taimirikādidhiyām iva kutaḥ pratyakṣatā?
analyzed: tad pratibhāsinaḥ ca abhinna rūpasya alīka tve kṣa samudbhavām api vṛttim anubhavataḥ sat samprayoga ja tva abhāvāt taimirika ādi dhiyām iva kutas pratyakṣa tā

original: na {p. 86.1} cārthakriyānibandhanaṃ rūpama-pāsya bījāder aparaḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvo 'sti,

original: tasmāt sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhana evāyaṃ keśakadalīstambādiṣv ivākārasāmyatāmātrāpahṛtahṛdayānāṃ bhrānta [S. 89b.] eva tattvādhyavasāyo mantavyaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt sadṛśa apara bhāva nibandhanaḥ eva ayam keśa kadalī stamba ādiṣu iva ākāra sāmya tā mātra apahṛta hṛdayānām bhrāntaḥ eva tattva adhyavasāyaḥ mantavyaḥ

original: bālānām / yadā tu vidhurapratyayopanipātād visadṛśāparabhāvaprasavaḥ tadā 'sya tattvādhyavasāyī pratyabhijñāpratyayo na bhūtim avalambate /

original: tadā tasyoktena prakāreṇa pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ bādhyamānatvāt tadātmatā nāstīti kutas tata ekatā bhāvānām?

original: tadanyajanyebhyo bhinnasvabhāvāni [S. 98b.] yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇam

original: tathā hi -- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣāder vilakṣaṇam evopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi kulāla ādi nirapekṣaḥ mṛd piṇḍaḥ tad anya janyāt vṛkṣa ādeḥ vilakṣaṇam eva upādāna bhāvena mṛd ātmakam kāryam janayan dṛṣṭaḥ
kulāla ādi sahitaḥ pi tad ātmakam eva ghaṭam

original: tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaś ca kevalamṛtpiṇḍād bhinnasvabhāvatayā tatkāryād apīṣṭakāder vilakṣaṇam eva karoti /
analyzed: tad kāraṇa āhita viśeṣaḥ ca kevala mṛd piṇḍāt bhinna svabhāva tayā tad kāryāt api iṣṭakā ādeḥ vilakṣaṇam eva karoti

original: api tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryam karoti tadvilakṣaṇam eva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāranāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti  #
analyzed: api tad anya upādāna sahitam sahakāri bhāvena yat kāryam karoti tad vilakṣaṇam eva mṛd piṇḍa sahitam ghaṭa ātmakam kāryam janayati iti

original: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopādānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayas tebhyo bhavati /
analyzed: tatra mṛd piṇḍāt bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ ghaṭasya ye tad anya upādānakāraṇatayā mṛd svabhāvāḥ na bhavanti vṛkṣa ādayaḥ tebhyaḥ bhavati

original: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍopādānāhitātiśayāt sahakāribhāvenopayujyamānāt tasyaiva ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍopādānatayā
analyzed: kulālāt mṛd piṇḍa upādāna āhita atiśayāt sahakāri bhāvena upayujyamānāt tasya eva ghaṭasya mṛd piṇḍa upādāna tayā

original: mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraḥ tadātmatayā tadanyebhyo

original: yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍas tadanyanimittasahita [S. 99a.] upādānam iṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /

original: bhinnātmakatayā cakrāder vibhakto vicchinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati tasmād anu[krā]ntakāraṇatrayajanyo

original: apīti kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvopagame 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /

kalpitasya eva saṃjñā bhedāt bhavet yadi
syāt
vastunaḥ na kathaṃcana
saṃkhyā bhedaḥ na eva anyaḥ mataḥ vacana bhedataḥ
kalpitasya eva kathañcid syāt vibhinna tā
ityādeḥ na tu
bhedaḥ eva viśīryeta tad eka a vyatirakataḥ
bhedaḥ syāt kalpanā kṛtaḥ
vā āsyāt abhede mṛṣārtha tā
anyonya abhāva rūpāṇām apara abhāva hetukaḥ

original: ekabhāvo yatas tasmān naikasya syād dvirūpatā// 21 //
analyzed: eka bhāvaḥ yatas tasmāt na ekasya syāt dvi rūpa tā

original: tasya bhedo 'pi tābhyāṃced yadi yenātmanāca te /
analyzed: tasya bhedaḥ tābhyām ced yadi yena ātmanā ca te
dharmī dharmaḥ tad anyaḥ ca yadi bhedaḥ tadā ātmanā
bhedaḥ eva atha tatra api tebhyaḥ
teṣām abheda siddhi artham prasaṅgaḥ pūrvavat bhavet
dharmi tvam tasya ca evam syāt tad tantra tvāt tad anyayoḥ
atra vaiśeṣika matam āśaṅkya āha anyat eva ityādi
saṃsthānam hi avayava sanniveśaḥ ucyate
sa ca saṃyoga lakṣaṇa tvāt guṇa rūpaḥ
tatas mṛd dravyāt asya anya tvam dravya guṇayoḥ

original: tena yadi mṛtpiṇḍasya mṛdātmatāyāṃ vyāpāraḥ kulālasya tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣe kathyate,
analyzed: tena yadi mṛd piṇḍasya mṛd ātma tāyām vyāpāraḥ kulālasya tat saṃsthāna viśeṣe kathyate

original: tadā tayor atyantabhedāt kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvaṃ prāptam iti /
analyzed: tadā tayoḥ atyanta bhedāt kāraṇa aneka tvāt kārya aneka tvam prāptam iti
siddhāntavādī āha uktam atra iti

original: mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ svabhāvabhede dūṣaṇam uktam {p. 108.1} mṛtsaṃsthānayor aparasparātmatayā ityādikam iti na saṃsthānasya mṛddravyād anyatvam
analyzed: mṛd saṃsthānayoḥ svabhāva bhede dūṣaṇam uktam mṛd saṃsthānayoḥ aparaspara ātmatayā ityādikam iti na saṃsthānasya mṛd dravyāt anya tvam
tatas mṛd piṇḍa upādāna āhita atiśayena tad kārya kṣaṇa sahakāriṇā kulālena tad upādāna upakṛta ātmanā

original: tatkāryakṣaṇasahakāriṇā mṛtpiṇḍena ca pratyekaṃ sakalam eva mṛtsaṃsthānātmakaṃ kāryaṃ
analyzed: tad kārya kṣaṇa sahakāriṇā mṛd piṇḍena ca pratyekam sakalam eva mṛd saṃsthāna ātmakam kāryam

original: kriyata iti na kāraṇānekatve 'py anekatvam asya /
analyzed: kriyate iti na kāraṇa aneka tve pi aneka tvam asya
atra eva upacaya hetum āha api ca

original: ityādi / yat tad ghaṭagataṃ saṃsthānaṃ yadi tata mṛdo bhinnaṃsyāt tadā kulālaḥ pṛthag eva kim iti na karoti? /
analyzed: ityādi yat tat ghaṭa gatam saṃsthānam yadi tata mṛdaḥ bhinnam syāt tadā kulālaḥ pṛthak eva kim iti na karoti
na hi bhinnānām āvaśyakam apṛthakkaraṇam

original: kulālaś cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya saṃsthānasya guṇātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyata iti sa pṛthag api tat kāryāt /
analyzed: kulālaḥ ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām tasya saṃsthānasya guṇa ātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyate iti sa pṛthak api tat kāryāt
paraḥ āha

original: {2}dravyāśrayya'guṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣv akāraṇam anapekṣa [VaiSū 1.1.16] iti guṇalakṣaṇāt sarvadā [S. 108b.] guṇo dravyapratantraḥ,
analyzed: saṃyoga vibhāgeṣu akāraṇam iti guṇa lakṣaṇāt sarvadā s guṇaḥ dravya pratantraḥ
sa katham kadācid pṛthak kriyeta
vaiśeṣike eva bauddhīyam codyam āśaṅkya āha tad saṃsthāne ityādi

original: yadi svabhāvenaiva tasya guṇātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya kriyāvad guṇavad [VaiSū 1.1.15] ityādivacanād ādhārasvabhāvaṃ tat mṛddravyaṃ,
analyzed: yadi svabhāvena eva tasya guṇa ātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya kriyāvat guṇavat iti ādi vacanāt ādhāra svabhāvam tat mṛd dravyam

original: saṃsthānaṃ vā tathāvidhaṃ kapālādheyātmakaṃ tadā kim iti kulālavyāpāram apekṣate? /
analyzed: saṃsthānam vā tathāvidham kapāla ādheya ātmakam tadā kim iti kulāla vyāpāram apekṣate
svatas eva kim na bhavati
iti ca udaka abhiprayaḥ
evam codyam āśaṅkya vaiśeṣikaḥ parihāram āha na
tatas ityādi

original: yat tat mṛddravyaṃ pṛthuvudhnodarādyākāraṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ tayor yaḥ sambandha ādhārādheyalakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yat tat mṛd dravyam pṛthu vudhna udara ādi ākāram ca saṃsthānam tayoḥ yaḥ sambandhaḥ ādhāra ādheya lakṣaṇaḥ

original: tatra yā yogyatā tāṃ dvayam apy etat kulālād yataḥ pratilabhate tasmāt kulālam apekṣate
analyzed: tatra yā yogyatā tām dvayam api etat kulālāt yatas pratilabhate tasmāt kulālam apekṣate

original: kulālānapekṣāyāṃ doṣam āha -- anyathā yadi tayoḥ parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālāpekṣā
analyzed: kulāla anapekṣāyām doṣam āha anyathā yadi tayoḥ paraspara sambandha yogya tāyām kulāla apekṣā

original: na syāt tadā svabhāvata eva mṛtpiṇḍasya [T. 281a.] tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatvaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: na syāt tadā svabhāvataḥ eva mṛd piṇḍasya t tathāvidha saṃsthāna sambandha yogya tvam bhavet

original: tasmiṃś ca sati vastuna eva tatsaṃsthānasambandhayogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatā 'stīti kulālasannidheḥ prāg api saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syād
analyzed: tasmin ca sati vastunaḥ eva tad saṃsthāna sambandha yogyatā lakṣaṇā dharmatā sti iti kulāla sannidheḥ prāk api saṃsthāna viśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāt
dravya saṃsthānayoḥ yathā kārya svabhāva tvāt
siddhāntavādī āha evam ityādi

original: yadi [S. 109a.] parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālam apekṣate evaṃ tarhi sāyogyatāmṛddravyasya kulālād bhavati iti[474]āpannam /
analyzed: yadi s paraspara sambandha yogya tāyām kulālam apekṣate evam tarhi sa ayogya tā mṛd dravyasya kulālāt bhavati

original: na ca anayoḥ mṛddravyayogyatayoḥ svabhāvasya bhedaḥ nānātvam /
analyzed: na ca anayoḥ mṛd dravya yogyatayoḥ svabhāvasya bhedaḥ nānātvam

original: yadi hi syāt tadā yogyatāyāḥ dravyāt pṛthakkaraṇaṃ prāgvat prasajyeta /
analyzed: yadi hi syāt tadā yogyatāyāḥ dravyāt pṛthakkaraṇam prāgvat prasajyeta

original: atha yogyatāyā api yogyapāratantryād apṛthaksiddhiṃ brūyāt tadā tasyā api vastudharmatayaiva
analyzed: atha yogya tāyāḥ api yogya pāratantryāt apṛthak siddhim brūyāt tadā tasyāḥ api vastu dharma tayā eva

original: prāg api samāveśo mā bhūd iti dravyeṇa saha sambandhayogyatāyā anyā yogyatā kulālād bhavatīty eṣṭavyā /
analyzed: prāk api samāveśaḥ mā bhūt iti dravyeṇa saha sambandha yogyatāyāḥ anyā yogyatā kulālāt bhavati iti eṣṭavyā
sā pi pṛthakkaraṇa prasaṅgāt dravyāt bhinna svabhāvā na upagantavyā

original: pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge vā punaḥ sa eva parihāraḥ tadīyaḥ,
analyzed: pṛthakkaraṇa prasaṅge vā punar saḥ eva parihāraḥ tadīyaḥ
punar tat eva uttaram

original: ity anavasthāprasaṅgād avaśyam abhinnasvabhāvatā kapālātmamamṛddravyayogyatayor abhyupagantavyā /
analyzed: iti anavasthā prasaṅgāt avaśyam abhinna svabhāva tā kapāla ātma ma mṛd dravya yogya tayoḥ abhyupagantavyā
kim evam sati siddham bhavati

original: ity ata āha -- asti tāvat ityādi /
analyzed: iti atas āha asti tāvat ityādi
mṛd piṇḍa kulālābhyām

original: kapāladravyasya [S. 109b.] saṃyogaviśeṣasambandhayogyasyārambhāt yadaikasvabhāvatve 'py ekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣatā tadā siddhaḥ āsmākīnaḥ  #
analyzed: kapāla dravyasya saṃyoga viśeṣa sambandha yogyasya ārambhāt yadā eka svabhāva tve pi ekasya aneka pratyaya upādheya viśeṣa tā tadā siddhaḥ āsmākīnaḥ
pakṣaḥ

original: tataś ca kim asmākaṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayor ekasvabhāvatvasādhanāya atinirbbandhanena? /
analyzed: tatas ca kim asmākam mṛd saṃsthānayoḥ eka svabhāva tva sādhanāya ati nirbbandhanena

original: [T. 281b.] yadi yogyatām apy āśrityānekapratyayajanyatve 'py ekatvāt nānātvaprasaṅgābhāvaḥ sidhyati kāryasya,
analyzed: api āśritya
na kiñcid dravya guṇa vāda nirākaraṇena iha prayojanam
anyatra eva tad nirākaraṇasya kṛta tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: nirbandhagrahaṇena ca mṛtsaṃsthānayor aparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛtsvabhāvaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayor apratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt ity anayopapattyā sādhitam  #
analyzed: nirbandha grahaṇena ca mṛd saṃsthānayoḥ aparaspara ātma tayā saṃsthāna mṛd svabhāva viśeṣābhyām tayoḥ a pratibhāsana prasaṅgāt iti anayā upapattyā sādhitam
eva anayoḥ eka tvam

original: yuktyantarāṇāṃ sambhave 'pi tadabhidhānalakṣaṇo nirbbandho na kriyate,
analyzed: yukti antarāṇām sambhave tad abhidhāna lakṣaṇaḥ nirbbandhaḥ na kriyate
prakṛta siddheḥ anyathā pi bhāvāt iti ācaṣṭe
iti upapannam t

original: tad evaṃ sāmagrībhedāt [S. 110a.] sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhedaḥ sahakāriṇām anekatve
analyzed: tat evam sāmagrī bhedāt s sāmagrī antara janyebhyaḥ bhedaḥ sahakāriṇām aneka tve

original: 'pi ca kāryasyaikatvam aviruddham iti pratipādya {p. 110.1} upasaṃharann āha -- tena
analyzed: ca kāryasya eka tvam aviruddham iti pratipādya upasaṃharan āha tena
sahakāriṇaḥ ityādi
yena pratyaya antara pracaye tad vikala sāmagryāḥ sāmagrī antaram sampadyate

original: tac ca pūrvasāmagrījanyād bhinnaṃ kāryāntaram eva janayati;
analyzed: tat ca pūrva sāmagrī janyāt bhinnam kārya antaram eva janayati
eka sāmagrī vyapadeśa viṣayāṇām ca sahakāriṇām aneka tve pi anekasya eka kriyā virodha abhāvāt

original: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinaś ca kāryasyaikasya darśanāt svabhāvata ekatvaṃ sādhitam
analyzed: tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ ca kāryasya ekasya darśanāt svabhāvataḥ eka tvam sādhitam

original: -- tena kāraṇena sahakaraṇaśīlā ekasāmagryantarggatāḥ pratyayāḥ sāmagry-antaraiḥ
analyzed: tena kāraṇena sahakaraṇa śīlāḥ eka sāmagrī antarggatāḥ pratyayāḥ sāmagrī antaraiḥ

original: saha naikopayogaviṣayāḥ eka upayogasya viṣayo yeṣāṃ te na bhavanti,
analyzed: saha na eka upayoga viṣayāḥ ekaḥ upayogasya viṣayaḥ yeṣām te na bhavanti

original: sāmagryantarair eva saha bhinnopayogāviṣayatvasya nyāyabalāt pratīteḥ /
analyzed: sāmagrī antaraiḥ eva saha bhinna upayoga aviṣaya tvasya nyāya balāt pratīteḥ

original: anena yat prāg vikalpitaṃ `yadi kāraṇaśabdena sāmagrī bhaṇyate tadā tadbhedād asty evātatsāmagrījanyebhyaḥ kāryasya bheda iti kim ucyate
analyzed: anena yat prāk vikalpitam yadi kāraṇa śabdena sāmagrī bhaṇyate tadā tad bhedāt asti eva a tad sāmagrī janyebhyaḥ kāryasya bhedaḥ iti kim ucyate

original: -- na kāraṇabhedād bhedaḥ [T. 282a.] syāt' iti etad 1udāharaṇopadarśitaṃ nigamitam[475]/
analyzed: na kāraṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ syāt iti etat udāharaṇa upadarśitam

original: atha kāraṇaśabdena sāmagrīvyapadeśaviṣayāḥ sahakāriṇa ucyante tadā tadbhedād anekatvalakṣaṇāt kāryasyānekatvalakṣaṇo bhedo neṣyata eva,
analyzed: atha kāraṇa śabdena sāmagrī vyapadeśa viṣayāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ ucyante tadā tad bhedāt anekatva lakṣaṇāt kāryasya anekatva lakṣaṇaḥ bhedaḥ na iṣyate eva
anekasya eka kriyā virodha abhāvāt
ekasya anekataḥ utpatti darśanāt ca iti mṛd saṃsthānayoḥ eka ātmaka tā upadarśitam
nigamayati kārya svabhāvasya mṛd saṃthāna ātmanaḥ eka tve pi nānātva abhāve pi vastutaḥ

original: paramārthataḥ kalpanābuddhau mṛtsaṃsthānayor bhinnayor iva pratibhāsane 'pīti /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ kalpanā buddhau mṛd saṃsthānayoḥ bhinnayoḥ iva pratibhāsane

original: evam udāharaṇe sāmagrībhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bhedo naikasāmagrīviṣayapratyayabhedād anekatvaṃ
analyzed: evam udāharaṇe sāmagrī bhedāt kāryāṇām bhedaḥ na eka sāmagrī viṣaya pratyaya bhedāt aneka tvam

original: kāryasyeti pratipādya prakṛte cakṣurādau yojayann āha -- yathāihodāharaṇe kāraṇabhedaḥ
analyzed: kāryasya iti pratipādya prakṛte cakṣuḥ ādau yojayan āha yathā iha udāharaṇe kāraṇa bhedaḥ

nānā svabhāveṣu tad vibhakta ghaṭa lakṣaṇeṣu upayogān
na eka kāryaḥ kintu bhinna kāryaḥ eva

original: tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa cakṣurādibhyo vijñānasyotpattau sāmagryantarāt sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedo 'nekakārya ity unneyaḥ /

original: {p.111.1} etad eva vibhajann āha -- tathāhi ityādi /
analyzed: eva   āha

original: yā cakṣūr uparahitā samanantarapratyayākhyavijñānalakṣaṇā pratyayāntarasāpekṣā sāmagrī,
analyzed: yā cakṣūḥ uparahitā samanantara pratyaya ākhya vijñāna lakṣaṇā pratyaya antara sāpekṣā sāmagrī

original: tato vijñānasya [T. 282b.] vikalpakasyetarasya vā tadupādeyatvena yā bodharūpatopalabdhā sā cakṣurvijñānasyāpi bhavati /
analyzed: tatas vijñānasya t vikalpakasya itarasya vā tad upādeya tvena yā bodha rūpa tā upalabdhā sā cakṣuḥ vijñānasya api bhavati
tasya eva cakṣuḥ vijñānasya
kidṛśasya

original: upalambhātmanaḥsato bhavataḥ jāyamānasya tadaiva tadekakāryapratiniyatasya cakṣurindriyasya

śabda ādi ākāra vivekavataḥ

original: viṣayād viṣayādhikāt[478]samanantarapratyayād indriyāc ca tena viṣayeṇa tulyarūpatā
analyzed: viṣayāt indriyāt ca tena viṣayeṇa tulya rūpa tā

original: na kevalaiva rūpapratibhāsitā bhrāntavijñānasyeveti viṣayendriyamanaskāralakṣaṇasāmagrīkāryam evaṃ pradarśitam /
analyzed: na kevalā eva rūpa pratibhāsi tā bhrānta vijñānasya iva iti viṣaya indriya manaskāra lakṣaṇa sāmagrī kāryam evam pradarśitam
tat anyat eka dvaya janyam tu kāryam
svayam abhyūhyam

original: atrābhinnatve 'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya cakṣurvijñānalakṣaṇasya kāraṇānāṃ viṣayendriyamanaskārāṇāṃ
analyzed: atra abhinna tve vastutas kāryasya cakṣuḥ vijñāna lakṣaṇasya kāraṇānām viṣaya indriya manaskārāṇām

original: bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyaḥ kevalānām eṣāṃ yaḥ svabhāvas tato bhinnā evātajjanyebhyo[479]vidhiśe(-nyebhyo 'pi viśe)

original: yata evam iti tasmāt na kāraṇabhede 'pi /
analyzed: yatas evam iti tasmāt na kāraṇa bhede pi

original: [S. 111b.] yathaikasāmagryantarggatapratyayabhede 'py abhedo naivaṃ sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhede 'py abhedaḥ sāmagryantarasjanyebhyaḥ kāryaviśeṣasya  #
analyzed: yathā eka sāmagrī antarggata pratyaya bhede pi abhedaḥ na evam sāmagrī lakṣaṇa kāraṇa bhede pi abhedaḥ sāmagrī antaraḥ janyebhyaḥ kārya viśeṣasya  /
viśiṣṭasya kāryasya iti

original: tena yaducyate -- [T. 283a.] `yadi sahakāriṇāṃ bhede 'py abhinnaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati sāmagrībhede 'py abhinnam astu,
analyzed: tena yat ucyate t yadi sahakāriṇām bhede pi abhinnam kāryam bhavati sāmagrī bhede pi abhinnam astu

analyzed: kā ca anyā mṛgyate yuktiḥ yathā tat dṛśyate tathā iti sarvatra iyam apratihatā yuktiḥ iti manyamānaḥ kumārilaḥ prāha kurvan dṛṣṭaḥ ityādi
yatas tadā eva kāryam
mayā tena darśana balena karoti iti brūmaḥ
kim atra anyayā upapattyā

original: , prāk tat kurvan na dṛṣṭaḥ tena na karotīty ekārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamaḥ sidhyati akṣaṇikānām apīti /

original: bhāvo hi kāryaṃ karoti tajjananasvabhāvatayā na darśanabalenādṛṣṭasyāpi svakāryakaraṇāt ato nedam uttaraṃ sambadhyata ity upahasann āha --  #
analyzed: bhāvaḥ hi kāryam karoti tad janana svabhāva tayā na darśana balena adṛṣṭasya api sva kārya karaṇāt atas na idam uttaram sambadhyate iti upahasan āha  /
aho mahā sāmarthyam ityādi
mahā prabhāvasya bhavataḥ mahā sāmarthyam darśanam

original: yasmād etad bhāvān kāryakaraṇasvabhāvavikalān api -- yadi kāryakaraṇasvabhāvatvād bhāvāḥ kāryaṃ kuryuḥ tadaitad evottaraṃ kiṃ noktam?
analyzed: yasmāt etat bhāvān kārya karaṇa svabhāva vikalān api yadi kārya karaṇa svabhāva tvāt bhāvāḥ kāryam kuryuḥ tadā etat eva uttaram kim na uktam

original: , yataḥ [S. 121a.] kāryakaraṇe darśanam uttarīkṛtam iti kṛtvā -- svabhāvamātreṇa ātmasattāmātreṇa
analyzed: yatas s kārya karaṇe darśanam uttarīkṛtam iti kṛtvā svabhāva mātreṇa ātma sattā mātreṇa

original: nānāprākāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte tat kathaṃ mahāsāmarthyaṃ na syāt? /
analyzed: nānā prākāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte tat katham mahā sāmarthyam na syāt

analyzed: vā vyākṣiptasya vai atrabhavataḥ iti pūjā vacanam p darśanasya viṣaya tām atikrāmet

original: ,[515]tasyāparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvāt[516]ity ata āha -- na hi sa sāhitye 'pi ityādi /

original: teṣām api pararūpeṇa kartṛtve svayam akārakatvāt /

original: tasmāt svarūpeṇaiva bhāvaḥ svakāryasya karttā na pararūpeṇeti nāsyottarasyāvakāśaḥ /

original: tato 'nyaḥ sahito 'nyaś ca kevalaḥ ity etad avicalam eveti /

original: atha yena svarūpeṇāyaṃ janakas tad asya sahitāsahitāvasthayoḥ sarvadā 'sti tadā svarūpaṃ

original: akṣepakriyāsvabhāvam iti tasmāt na kathaṃcit kāryakriyāvirāmaḥ /

original: athavā kadācit paro brūyāt svahetubhir evāyaṃ pratyayāntarāpekṣaḥ [T. 292b.] svakāryajananasvabhāvo janita iti kevalo na karoti /

na ca asya sahita asahita avasthayoḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ

original: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvatāyāḥ [S. 123a.] sarvadā bhāvāt ity ata āha -- na hi sa sāhitye 'pi ityādi /
analyzed: pratyaya antara apekṣa sva kārya janana svabhāva tāyāḥ sarvadā bhāvāt iti atas āha na hi sa sāhitye pi ityādi

original: svarūpeṇaivāsya kartṛtvāt tasya ca prāg api bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣāyāś ca tato labhyasyātmātiśayasyābhāvenāyogāt upakāralakṣaṇatvād asya,

anyathā tiprasaṅgāt

original: kevalasya kāryakaraṇam anivāryam iti akurvataḥ kathaṃ sahitāvasthāyā na bhedaḥ syāt? iti bhāvaḥ /

original: pratyayāntarasannidhānopalakṣitakāle kārakatvaṃ na prāg ity ayam arthaḥ /

original: sa tarhi sarvadā tatsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ kinna karoti? iti cet /

original: [T. 296a.] tathā prabhāsvarād apavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāg iva paścād apy arthapratipattiṃ  #

original: `ye hy avyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātās teṣv avilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,

original: ity ata āha -- tatra yathāsvaṃ yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,

original: tatra kālakṣepabhāvini kārye karttavye hetusantāno 'parāparakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇa ātmātiśayāsādanārthaṃ

original: tatas tebhyaḥ kāraṇāntarebhyaḥ svabhāvāntarasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaparamparālakṣaṇasya pratilabhyaḥ santānasyaikatvenādhimuktasyocyate loke

original: paramārthas tu tatrāpi pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe [T. 297a.] viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ity ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam  #

analyzed: atha kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa janaka viśeṣa apekṣayā prāgvat prathama samparkka bhājaḥ parasparataḥ nirviśeṣāḥ iti abhimatam tat api ayuktam

original: yataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ [S. 131b.] kṣitibījādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye [T. 300a.] vyavadhānādirahitatvenopanipātinaḥ /
analyzed: yatas kārya utpāda anuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ kṣiti bīja ādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye t vyavadhāna ādi rahita tvena upanipātinaḥ

original: tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt etāvanmātranibandhanatvāc ca 4janakaṃ vya(-kavya)vasthāyāḥ[540]/

original: , yataḥ kevalānām api kāryakriyā prasajyeta tad darśayati -- yogyo deśo yeṣāṃ te yogyadeśāḥ,
analyzed: yatas kevalānām api kārya kriyā prasajyeta tat darśayati yogyaḥ deśaḥ yeṣām te yogyadeśāḥ

original: sā ādir yeṣāṃ avyavahitadeśatvādīnām avasthābhedānāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
analyzed: sā ādiḥ yeṣām avyavahita deśa tva ādīnām avasthā bhedānām te tathā uktāḥ

original: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ tu viśeṣaṃ vyavadhānādirahitadeśopanipātamātreṇety[546]ata āha -- kāryadvaividhyaṃca yasmāt tasmād evaṃvibhajyate /

original: ata āha -- sahakāribhir avyavadhānādideśair anantaraṃ sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāgavasthāpekṣaviśiṣṭakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā

ye viśeṣāḥ tad paramparayā uttara uttara viśiṣṭa viśiṣṭatara ādi kṣaṇa bhāva rūpayā utpattiḥ

original: śālyaṅkuraś ca tadbījajanyasvabhāvo na yavādibījajanyasvabhāva iti na bhāvānāṃ svahetubalāyātāḥ pramāṇādhigatāḥ svābhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ /

original: tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavāt kevalo 'pi na kevalaṃ sahitaḥ tathāsyāt tatkāryakārakaḥ syād ity uktaṃ bahuśaḥ /

niścayaḥ bhavati

original: nanu ca prakārāntarābhāvāt kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā kramayaugapadyābhyām eva kriyata ity ucyate sa eva tu prakārāntaravirahaḥ [T. 310b.]  #
analyzed: nanu ca prakāra antara abhāvāt kāryam aṅkura ādikam bīja ādinā krama yaugapadyābhyām eva kriyate iti ucyate saḥ eva tu prakāra antara virahaḥ
kārya ātmanaḥ kutas siddhaḥ
prakāra antarasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tve katham atyanta asambhavaḥ
kevalam deśa ādi niṣedha mātram eva syāt
anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tve kutas tad abhāva siddhiḥ

original: tataḥ prakārāntareṇārthakriyāsambhavāt kramayaugapadyanivṛttāv api nārthakriyāsāmartthyanivṛttir iti kuto 'kṣaṇikatve sati sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇam
analyzed: tatas prakāra antareṇa arthakriyā sambhavāt krama yaugapadya nivṛttau api nā arthakriyā sāmartthya nivṛttiḥ iti kutas kṣaṇika tve sati sarva sāmarthya viraha lakṣaṇam
yatas sattvasya kṣaṇika ātma tayā nvaya vyatirekau syātām na
ubhayathā pi adoṣāt

original: [S. 143a.] tathā hi -- kramo nāma paripāṭiḥ kāryāntarāsāhityaṃ kaivalyam aṅkurādeḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi kramaḥ nāma paripāṭiḥ kārya antara asāhityam kaivalyam aṅkura ādeḥ
yaugapadyam api tasya aparaiḥ bbīja ādi kāryaiḥ sāhityam
tasya ca aṅkura ādi svabhāvasya anya sahitasya

original: kevalasya vā 'bhāve pratyakṣabodhagamyamāne saty upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva svabhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyabhāvabahirbhūto nopalabhyate /
analyzed: kevalasya vā bhāve pratyakṣa bodha gamyamāne sati upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ krama yaugapadya bhāva bahis bhūtaḥ na upalabhyate

original: vastunaḥ upalabhyasyānyasāhitye kaivalye cāpanīte tadviviktadeśādipratibhāsinaḥ[569]pratyakṣasyodayāt svabhāvānupalambhata evābhāvaniścayādilakṣaṇavyavahāravṛtteḥ
analyzed: vastunaḥ upalabhyasya anya sāhitye kaivalye ca apanīte svabhāva anupalambhataḥ eva abhāva niścaya ādi lakṣaṇa vyavahāra vṛtteḥ

original: tasya cāṅkurādibhāvasyāvasthādvayabahirbhāvaniṣedhe kayościddeśakālayoḥ deśāntarādau krameṇāṅkurādibhāvavatītarasmin vā bhāve 'pi na kācit
analyzed: tasya ca aṅkura ādi bhāvasya avasthā dvaya bahirbhāva niṣedhe kayościd deśa kālayoḥ deśa antara ādau krameṇa aṅkura ādi bhāvavati itarasmin vā bhāve na kācid

original: tataḥ pratyakṣata eva [T. 311a.] prakārāntarābhāvasiddheḥ kathaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāśaktir avyāptā syāt? /
analyzed: tatas pratyakṣataḥ eva prakāra antara abhāva siddheḥ katham krama yaugapadyābhyām arthakriyā śaktiḥ a vyāptā syāt

original: śāstrakāras tu yathā pratyakṣatā eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddhiḥ tathā svayam etena kramākramādayo 'pīti atidiśan vakṣyati /
analyzed: śāstra kāraḥ tu yathā pratyakṣa tā eva prakāra antara abhāva siddhiḥ tathā svayam etena kramākrama ādayaḥ api iti atidiśan vakṣyati

original: {p. 148.1} anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatve 'pi prakārāntarasya kramayaugapadyayor anyo 'nyavya[S.143b.]vacchedarūpatvād evāśrayasi(-d evābhāvasi)
analyzed: anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tve pi prakāra antarasya krama yaugapadyayoḥ anyaḥ

original: ddhiḥ tathā hi -- anyonyavyavacchedarūpāṇām ekaniṣedhenāparavidhānāt tasyā[570]'pratiṣedhe vidhipratiṣedhayor virodhād ubhayapratiṣedhātmanaḥ  #
analyzed: ddhiḥ tathā hi anyonya vyavaccheda rūpāṇām eka niṣedhena apara vidhānāt vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ virodhāt ubhaya pratiṣedha ātmanaḥ
prakāra antarasya kutas sambhavaḥ

original: atra prayogaḥ -- yatra yatprakāravyavacchedena yaditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ na tatra prakārāntarasambhavaḥ,
analyzed: atra prayogaḥ yatra yad prakāra vyavacchedena yad itara prakāra vyavasthānam na tatra prakāra antara sambhavaḥ

asti ca krama yaugapadyayoḥ anyatara prakāra vyavacchedena tad itara prakāra vyavasthānam
vyavacchidyamāna prakāra a viṣayīkṛte sarvatra viruddha upalabdhiḥ

original: tam ihāpi kāryahetau paraḥ kadācit prasañjayed ity āśaṅkamāna āha -- kāryakāraṇa- ityādi [T. 312b.] yadi hi kāryaṃ hetur ucyate tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvena  #
analyzed: tam iha api kārya hetau paraḥ kadācid prasañjayet iti āśaṅkamānaḥ āha kārya kāraṇe ityādi t yadi hi kāryam hetuḥ ucyate tadā kārya kāraṇa bhāvena

janya janaka bhāvaḥ hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ucyate

original: sa ca nāgnidhūmayor aṃśena api tu sarveṇa prakāreṇa /

original: tathā hi -- yathā agnir agnitvadravyatvasatvādibhiḥ sāmānyadharmair janakaḥ tathā tārṇapārṇatvādibhir viśeṣadharmair api,
analyzed: tathā hi yathā agniḥ agni tva dravya tva sattva ādibhiḥ sāmānya dharmaiḥ janakaḥ tathā tārṇa pārṇa tva ādibhiḥ viśeṣa dharmaiḥ api

original: yathā ca dhūmo dhūmatvapāṇḍutvādibhiḥ svaniyatair viśeṣadharmair janyaḥ tathā [S. 145b.]
analyzed: yathā ca dhūmaḥ dhūma tva pāṇḍu tva ādibhiḥ sva niyataiḥ viśeṣa dharmaiḥ janyaḥ tathā
sāmānya dharmaiḥ api sattva dravya tva ādibhiḥ

original: tataś ca yathā tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti,
analyzed: tatas ca yathā tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tathā eva gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ prāpnoti

original: atrāha -- na sarvathājanyajanakabhāvaḥ tataś ca kutas tathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt? /

original: {p. 151.1} tadbhāve teṣāṃ tārṇapārṇatvādīnāṃ viśeṣadharmāṇām abhāve bhavato dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmebhyo bhavatīti evam ātmanaḥ  #
analyzed: tad bhāve teṣām tārṇa pārṇa tva ādīnām viśeṣa dharmāṇām abhāve bhavataḥ dhūma mātrasya tebhyaḥ eva viśeṣa dharmebhyaḥ bhavati iti evam ātmanaḥ
tad utpatti niyamasya abhāvāt

original: tathā tadabhāve agnyabhāve bhavato dravyatvādeḥ [T. 313a.] sāmānyadharmasyāgner evāyaṃ bhavatīty evaṃrūpasya tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt kutaḥ  #
analyzed: tathā tad abhāve agni abhāve bhavataḥ dravya tva ādeḥ sāmānya dharmasya agneḥ eva ayam bhavati iti evaṃrūpasya tad utpatti niyamasya abhāvāt kutas
sarvathā janya janaka bhāvaḥ

original: idānīṃ kāraṇasthaiḥ svabhāvair yāvadbhir agnitvadravyatvādibhir avinābhāvi teṣāṃ kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ hetuḥ kāryaṃ gamakam /

original: vā dhūmādes tasyāgnīndhanādisāmagrījanyasya dhūmasya tatlakṣaṇasya cotpattāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ

original: iti tasmād yat kiñcit kāryaṃ yataḥkutaścit kāraṇāt syāt utpadyeta,

original: tato vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanmanaḥ kāryasya kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpasyopalakṣaṇe 'py anyādṛśataiveti sarvas tādṛśas tathāvidhajanmeti siddham /
analyzed: tatas vilakṣaṇa sāmagrī janmanaḥ kāryasya kutaścid sāmyāt sarūpasya upalakṣaṇe pi anyādṛśa tā eva iti sarvaḥ tādṛśaḥ tathāvidha janmā iti siddham

original: na tu tadviviktajñānam eva yathāhakumārilaḥvijñānaṃvānyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti /

original: yathā hy anyavastuviṣayaṃ jñānam anubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi /
analyzed: yathā hi anya vastu viṣayam jñānam anubhūyamānam pratiyogi smaraṇa apekṣam tad abhāva vyavahāra nibandhanam tathā tad viviktaḥ pradeśaḥ pi

original: tathā hi -- kasyacit pratipattuḥ `yataḥ kevalapradeśākāram eva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāram api tasmād atra ghaṭo nāsti` iti evaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā hi kasyacid pratipattuḥ yatas kevala pradeśa ākāram eva jñānam mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭa ākāram api tasmāt atra ghaṭaḥ na asti iti evam
nāstitā jñānam utpadyate

original: kasyacit tu `yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmān nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity
analyzed: kasyacid tu yatas kevalaḥ pradeśaḥ yam dṛśyate na tu ghaṭa sahitaḥ tasmāt na asti atra ghaṭaḥ iti

original: evam / tasmād ubhayor nāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyam iti dvayor api anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti /
analyzed: evam tasmāt ubhayoḥ nāstitā jñāna janmani tulyam sāmarthyam iti dvayoḥ api anupalabdhi vyavasthā yuktā iti

original: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇā 'nupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyā 'pekṣayā yadā tatsvabhāvas tadā jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā karmasthakriyāpekṣayeti
analyzed: tatra yadā tat jñānam tadā jñātṛ dharma lakṣaṇā nupalabdhiḥ kartṛ stha kriyā pekṣayā yadā tad svabhāvaḥ tadā jñeya dharma lakṣaṇā karma stha kriyā apekṣayā iti

original: evam anupalabdhiṃ [S. 166b.] paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyam asyā darśayann āha -- sāabhāvam ityādi /
analyzed: evam anupalabdhim paryudāsa vṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyam asyāḥ darśayan āha ityādi

original: sarvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte 'pi [T. 331a.] pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginy arthitvādibhiḥ smṛtir asya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ
analyzed: sarva anya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta vivikte pi t pradeśa ādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭa ādau pratiyogini arthi tva ādibhiḥ smṛtiḥ asya bhavati tasya abhāvam
abhāva vyavahāram vā
kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhī abhāvam abhāva vyavahāram ca sādhayataḥ
svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ tu abhāva vyavahāram eva
abhāva vyavahāraḥ ca jñāna abhidhāna pravṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ

original: tatra `nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity evam ākāraṃ jñānam,
analyzed: tatra na asti atra ghaṭaḥ iti evam ākāram jñānam

original: evaṃvidhavastvabhidhāyakaṃ cābhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttir iti /
analyzed: evaṃvidha vastu abhidhāyakam ca abhidhānam niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamana āgamana lakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ iti

original: {p. 175.1} atreśvarasenakumārilayor vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkya siddhāntavyavasthām eva kurvatā tanmate niraste 'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārtham āha  #
analyzed: atra īśvarasena kumārilayoḥ vacana avakāśam āśaṅkya siddhānta vyavasthām eva kurvatā tad mate niraste pi āhatya tad mata nirāsa artham āha
katham anya bhāvaḥ ityādi

original: īśvaraseno hi manyate -- kārya-svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇād avaśyam abhāvarūpatvam asyāḥ,
analyzed: īśvarasenaḥ hi manyate kārya svabhāva hetubhyām bhāva rūpābhyām anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇāt avaśyam abhāva rūpa tvam asyāḥ
anyathā pṛthakkaraṇam anarthakam eva syāt

original: tvayā [S. 167a.] cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādes tajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhir ākhyāyate tannūnam anyabhāvas tadabhāvo yenaivam  #
analyzed: tvayā ca anyasya pratiṣedhya viviktasya pradeśa ādeḥ tad jñānasya vā bhāva rūpa anupalabdhiḥ ākhyāyate tat nūnam anya bhāvaḥ tad abhāvaḥ yena evam
abhidhīyate
na ca etat yujyate
bhāva abhāvayoḥ virodhāt eka ātma tā anupapatteḥ iti

original: kumārilo 'py evaṃ manyate -- yeyaṃ jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhā 'nupalabdhir abhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ
analyzed: kumārilaḥ pi evam manyate yā iyam jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇā dvidhā nupalabdhiḥ abhāva rūpā tvayā ucyate tasyāḥ bhavatu nāstitā jñānam prati sādhana bhāvaḥ

original: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ [T. 331b.] pratiṣedhyajñānād anyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa katham abhāvaḥ?
analyzed: kintu saḥ eva anyasya pratiṣedhya viviktasya vastunaḥ pratiṣedhya jñānāt anyasya vā tad jñānasya yaḥ bhāvaḥ bhāva aṃśaḥ sa katham abhāvaḥ
pratiṣedhyasya tad jñānasya vā katham abhāva aṃśaḥ
na eva yujyate
dharma rūpa tayā bhāva abhāva aṃśayoḥ bhedāt

original: saty api dharmirūpeṇābhede tayoś codbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ grahaṇāgrahaṇavyavastheti / yad āha --
analyzed: sati api dharmi rūpeṇa abhede tayoḥ ca udbhava abhibhavābhyām grahaṇa agrahaṇa vyavasthā iti yat āha

original: dharmayor bheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi naḥsthite /
analyzed: dharmayoḥ bhedaḥ iṣṭaḥ hi dharmya bhede naḥ sthite
udbhava abhibhava ātma tvāt
iti

original: uktottaratām asya darśayann āha -- uktam uttaram atra codye yathā paryudāsavṛttyāapekṣātaḥ /
analyzed: ukta uttara tām asya darśayan āha uktam uttaram atra codye yathā

original: `pratiṣedhyaṃ tajjñānaṃ vā apekṣya tadvivikto 'rthas tajjñānaṃ [S. 167b.] vā 'bhāvo 'nupalabdhiś cocyate` itiīśvarasenasya prativacanam /
analyzed: pratiṣedhyam tad jñānam vā apekṣya tad viviktaḥ rthaḥ tad jñānam vā bhāvaḥ nupalabdhiḥ ca ucyate iti īśvarasenasya prativacanam

original: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kin tu paryudāso 'pi /
analyzed: na hi prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ eva ekaḥ nañ arthaḥ kin tu
tatas nyabhāvasya abhāva rūpa tā na virudhyate
prasajya pratiṣedha rūpa tā pi anya bhāvasya yathā tathā uttaratra vakṣyate
svabhāva hetoḥ tu anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇam pratipattṛ abhiprāya vaśāt
pratipattā hi svabhāva hetau vastu pratipatti adhyavasāyī
anupalabdhau tu abhāva pratipattī adhyavasāyī

original: paramārthatas tu pratiṣedhyābhāvavyavahārayogyatā {p. 176.1} vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhir bhidyata[649]iti
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu pratiṣedhya abhāva vyavahāra yogya tā vastu bhūtā eva pradeśasya sādhyate iti na svabhāva hetoḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ

original: yat tu `anapekṣitārthāntarasaṃsarggaṃ pratiṣedhamātram anupalabdhiḥ` itīśvaraseno manyate tannirākurvann āha -- na pratiṣedhamātram ityādi
analyzed: yat tu an apekṣita artha antara saṃsarggam pratiṣedha mātram anupalabdhiḥ iti īśvarasenaḥ manyate tat nirākurvan āha na pratiṣedha mātram ityādi

original: kasmāt? ity āha -- tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ ityādi /
analyzed: kasmāt iti āha tasya sādhana asiddheḥ ityādi

original: [T. 332a.] na hy abhāvasya sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasya sādhanatvaṃ siddhihetutvaṃ sidhyati,
analyzed: sidhyati
sarva sāmarthya viraha rūpasya
hetu tve vā katham na sāmarthya yogi tā
bhāva rūpa tā vā
sāmarthya lakṣaṇa tvāt vastunaḥ

original: abhāvasya [S. 168a.] cānapekṣitasahakāriṇo anādheyātiśayatayā nāstīti jñānajanane nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: abhāvasya ca anapekṣita sahakāriṇaḥ anādheya atiśaya tayā na asti iti jñāna janane nityam tad janana prasaṅgaḥ

original: tataś ca sādhakatvāyogād abhāvavyavahāra eva na sidhyet /
analyzed: tatas ca sādhaka tva ayogāt abhāva vyavahāraḥ eva na sidhyet

original: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanam eva kiñcin na sidhyatīti /
analyzed: athavā tasya prasajya pratiṣedha ātmanaḥ upalabdhi abhāvasya sādhanam eva kiñcid na sidhyati iti

original: sa hy abhāvatvād apareṇopalabdhyabhāvena sādhyaḥ syāt,
analyzed: sa hi abhāva tvāt apareṇa upalabdhi abhāvena sādhyaḥ syāt
saḥ u pi apareṇa iti anavasthānam
na ca indriya vat ajñātasya pratiṣedha jñāna hetu tā
sadā sannihita tvena anapekṣita sahakāriṇaḥ nityam tad udaya prasaṅgāt
idam ca artha dvayam katham abhāvaḥ kasyacid
pratipattiḥ pratipatti hetuḥ vā

original: tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiḥ` ity 4atrāntare svayam eva vipañcayiṣyati[651]/
analyzed: tasya api katham pratipattiḥ iti atra antare svayam eva

original: kumārilasyāpy uttaram āha -- tasya anyasya pratiyoginā vastvantareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya /
analyzed: kumārilasya api uttaram āha tasya anyasya pratiyoginā vastu antareṇa asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpasya

original: na hy asau vastvantaraiḥ saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāva ekarūpaḥ /
analyzed: na hi asau vastu antaraiḥ saṃsṛṣṭa svabhāvaḥ eka rūpaḥ

original: tathātve hy abhāvāṃśo 'pi na kvacit sidhyet /
analyzed: tathātve hi abhāva aṃśaḥ na kvacid sidhyet

original: tasyaivaṃvidhasya bhāvasiddhir eva bhāvāṃśasiddhir eva aparasya pratiyogino vastvantarasyābhāvasiddhir
analyzed: tasya evaṃvidhasya bhāva siddhiḥ eva bhāva aṃśa siddhiḥ eva aparasya pratiyoginaḥ vastu antarasya abhāva siddhiḥ

original: abhāvāṃśasya tvadabhimatasya siddhir astu bhāvāṃśasyaivābhāvāṃśarūpatopapatter iti manyate /
analyzed: abhāva aṃśasya tvad abhimatasya siddhiḥ astu bhāva aṃśasya eva abhāva aṃśa rūpa tā upapatteḥ iti manyate

original: tathā hi -- abhāvāṃśo 'pi pararūpāsaṃsṛṣṭatayaivābhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
analyzed: tathā hi para rūpa asaṃsṛṣṭa tayā eva abhāvaḥ iti vyapadiśyate
anyathā s tad ayogāt

original: sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kim anyenābhāvāṃśopagatena? /
analyzed: sā ca bhāva aṃśasya api samānā iti saḥ eva abhāvaḥ stu tad nimittasya samāna tvāt kim anyena abhāva aṃśa upagatena
atas eva asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpasya iti viśeṣaṇam

original: yata {p. 177.1} evam iti tasmād anyabhāvo 'pi anyasya vastuno bhāvo 'pi tvadabhimato bhāvāṃśo 'pi na kevalam abhāvāṃśas tvanmatyā 'bhāva iti  #
analyzed: evam iti tasmāt anya bhāvaḥ anyasya vastunaḥ bhāvaḥ anyasya vastunaḥ bhāvaḥ anya abhimataḥ bhāva aṃśaḥ anya na kevalam abhāva aṃśaḥ tvad matyā bhāvaḥ iti
vyapadiśyate smābhiḥ
tatas bhāva aṃśasya abhāva rūpa tā saṅgatā eva iti
na kiñcid virudhyate iti

original: yad uktaṃ `jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ`[652]iti tat paro vighaṭayituṃ,
analyzed: yat uktam jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇayā svabhāva anupalabdhyā abhāva vyavahāraḥ eva sādhyate tat paras vighaṭayitum
yat ca uktam na pratiṣedha mātram anupalabdhiḥ

original: tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ`[653]iti dvitīye vyākhyāne[654]pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhi[r i]ty 4etasya sādhanaṃ[655]darśayitum āha -- anyabhāvalakṣaṇa  #
analyzed: tasya dvitīye iti etasya āha
ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate -- loko hi kevalapradeśadarśanāt ghaṭābhāvam eva prathamaṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: evam manyate lokaḥ hi kevala pradeśa darśanāt ghaṭa abhāvam eva prathamam pratipadyate

original: kevalapradeśajñānasaṃvedanadvāreṇa ghaṭajñānābhāvapratipattyā vā tato ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāram /
analyzed: kevala pradeśa jñāna saṃvedana dvāreṇa ghaṭa jñāna abhāva pratipattyā vā tatas ghaṭa abhāvasya vyavahāram

original: tena lokapratītyanusāreṇa pratiṣedhyād anyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhyajñānād vā tajjñānasya
analyzed: tena loka pratīti anusāreṇa pratiṣedhyāt anyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhya jñānāt vā tad jñānasya

original: yo bhāvas tallakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇenendriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa
analyzed: yaḥ bhāvaḥ tad lakṣaṇaḥ bhāvaḥ svayam pramāṇena indriya pratyakṣeṇa sva saṃvedana pratyakṣeṇa

original: ca siddho 'laṃ [S. 169a.] ghaṭābhāvaṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramaṃ sādhayitum,
analyzed: ca siddhaḥ laṃ s ghaṭa abhāvam sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramam sādhayitum

original: sa ca ghaṭābhāvavyavahāram ity evaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ
analyzed: sa ca ghaṭa abhāva vyavahāram iti evam vyavasthāpayitum

original: yuktam / na caivam api vyavasthāpane [asma]tpakṣasya kācit kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: yuktam na ca evam api vyavasthāpane asmad pakṣasya kācid kṣatiḥ

original: tathā hi -- pāramparyeṇāpi yad anupalabdheḥ tvadabhyupagatāyāḥ siddhaṃ tat tat eva siddhaṃ bhavatīti [T. 333a.] pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhitve  #
analyzed: tathā hi pāramparyeṇa api yat anupalabdheḥ tvad abhyupagatāyāḥ siddham tat tat eva siddham bhavati iti pratiṣedha mātrasya anupalabdhi tve
tad sādhana pratipādane pi

original: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yathā bhavato jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā bhāvarūpā dvividhā 'nupalabdhis
analyzed: ayam abhiprāyaḥ yathā bhavataḥ jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇā bhāva rūpā dvividhā nupalabdhiḥ

original: tathā mamāpi jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvo 'py anupalabdhisaṃjñito dvividho bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tathā mama api jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇa upalabdhi abhāvaḥ pi anupalabdhi saṃjñitaḥ dvividhaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tatra jñeyadharmalakṣaṇenānyabhāvena pratyakṣasiddhena pratiṣedhyābhāvo jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvarūpa 'nupalabdhisaṃjñitaḥ setsyati
analyzed: tatra jñeya dharma lakṣaṇena anya bhāvena pratyakṣa siddhena pratiṣedhya abhāvaḥ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇa upalabdhi abhāva rūpa nupalabdhi saṃjñitaḥ setsyati

original: jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇena cānyabhāvena kevalapradeśajñānātmanā svasaṃvedanasiddhena jñātṛdharmaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānābhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisamākhyātaḥ  #
analyzed: jñātṛ dharma lakṣaṇena ca anya bhāvena kevala pradeśa jñāna ātmanā sva saṃvedana siddhena jñātṛ dharmaḥ pratiṣedhya jñāna abhāva rūpaḥ nupalabdhi samākhyātaḥ
setsyati

original: tataś ca kuto 'navasthā yena sādhanāsiddhiḥ syād iti /
analyzed: tatas ca kutas navasthā yena sādhana asiddhiḥ syāt iti

original: tatra[656]anyabhāvalakṣaṇa iti pratiṣedhyāt tajjñānāc ca yo 'nyo bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktaḥ pradeśaḥ
analyzed: iti pratiṣedhyāt tad jñānāt ca yaḥ nyaḥ bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhya viviktaḥ pradeśaḥ

original: tajjñānaṃ ca tadātmako 'bhāvaḥ vivakṣitād bhāvāt pratiṣedhyād bhāvāt tajjñānāc cānyatvād
analyzed: tad jñānam ca tad ātmakaḥ bhāvaḥ vivakṣitāt bhāvāt pratiṣedhyāt bhāvāt tad jñānāt ca anya tvāt
anupalabdhi tvena bhavataḥ bhimataḥ svayam sva rūpeṇa pramāṇena indriya pratyakṣeṇa

original: svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa ca siddhaḥ saṃs tasya [S. 169b.] pratiṣedhyasyābhāvavyavahāraṃ
analyzed: sva saṃvedana pratyakṣeṇa ca siddhaḥ san tasya pratiṣedhyasya abhāva vyavahāram
jñāna abhidhāna pravṛtti lakṣaṇam sādhayet tad siddhi siddhaḥ vā tasya anya bhāva lakṣaṇasya abhāvasya

original: yathoktasya siddhyā siddho vā tadabhāvas tasya pratiṣedhyasya tajjñānasya[657]vā
analyzed: yathā uktasya siddhyā siddhaḥ vā tad abhāvaḥ tasya pratiṣedhyasya

original: 'bhāva iti evam apīṣyamāṇe na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tvadabhimatānupalabdhito 'smadabhimatānupalabdheḥ
analyzed: bhāvaḥ iti evam api iṣyamāṇe na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tvad abhimata anupalabdhitaḥ smad abhimata anupalabdheḥ
t tatas smat darśanam kim iti pratikṣipyate

original: nanv asty evaivam iṣyamāṇe viśeṣo 'nyabhāvalakṣaṇānupalabdhir itarayā[658]vyavahitā
analyzed: nanu asti eva evam iṣyamāṇe viśeṣaḥ nyabhāva lakṣaṇa anupalabdhiḥ

original: tadabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed itarā tu sākṣād ity āha -- sa viśeṣo nāsti yena viśeṣeṇānupalabdhyā
analyzed: tad abhāva vyavahāram sādhayet itarā tu sākṣāt iti āha sa viśeṣaḥ na asti yena viśeṣeṇa anupalabdhyā
bhāva rūpayā vastu saṃsparśa rahitayā smad abhimatayā bhāva vyavahāra siddheḥ virodhaḥ

original: syāt / anyasya tu viśeṣasya sato 'py abādhakatvād asatsamatvam eva /
analyzed: syāt anyasya tu viśeṣasya sataḥ api a bādhaka tvāt asat samatvam eva
yat api uktam tasya sādhana abhāvat
tat api asat

original: yataḥ sa eva tvadabhimato 'nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktabhūtalātmakas tadviṣayā copalabdhir
analyzed: yatas saḥ eva tvad abhimataḥ nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhya vivikta bhū tala ātmakaḥ tad viṣayā ca upalabdhiḥ
anupalabdhi tvena iṣṭāḥ bhavataḥ tad abhāvasya anupalabdhi tvena asmad matasya pratiṣedhya abhāvasya

original: tadupalabdhyabhāvasya ca kiṃ kasmāt na sādhanaṃ liṅgam iṣyate? /
analyzed: tad upalabdhi abhāvasya ca kim kasmāt na sādhanam liṅgam iṣyate

original: tathā hi sati lokapratītir anusṛtā bhavati /
analyzed: tathā hi sati loka pratītiḥ anusṛtā bhavati

original: kiṃpunaḥkasmāt punaḥ abhāvasya dvividhasya siddhir eva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ na tatsādhyā kācid anyā [S. 170a] vidyata ity asmanmataniṣedhārthaṃ  #
analyzed: kim punar kasmāt punar abhāvasya dvividhasya siddhiḥ eva tad abhāva siddhiḥ na tad sādhyā kācid anyā vidyate iti asmad mata niṣedha artham
loka atikrāntam iṣyate iti pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: atrāha -- apṛthaksiddher anyabhāvāt tadabhāvasya pṛthaksiddher abhāvāt kuto liṅgaliṅgitā /
analyzed: atra āha apṛthak siddheḥ anya bhāvāt tad abhāvasya pṛthak siddheḥ abhāvāt kutas liṅga liṅgi tā

original: tathā sambandhābhāvāc ca anyabhāvatadabhāvayor na liṅgaliṅgiteti /
analyzed: tathā sambandha abhāvāt ca anya bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ na liṅga liṅgi tā iti

original: prathamaṃ tāvat kāraṇaṃ [T. 334a.] vivṛṇvann āha anyabhāvas tadviviktapradeśātmakas tāvan na sādhanaṃliṅgaṃ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya,
analyzed: prathamam tāvat kāraṇam vivṛṇvan āha anya bhāvaḥ tad vivikta pradeśa ātmakaḥ tāvat na sādhanam liṅgam pratiṣedhya abhāvasya

original: `tadupalabdhir api tadabhāvasya na sādhanam` iti paścād vakṣyate /
analyzed: tad upalabdhiḥ api tad abhāvasya na sādhanam iti paścāt vakṣyate
tad artham eva tāvat śabdaḥ
kasmāt anya bhāvaḥ na sādhanam

original: ity āha -- yatsiddhau yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau yasya aparasya {p. 179.1} vastuno na siddhir na pratītiḥ tad vastu tasya vastuno liṅgaṃ  #
analyzed: iti āha yad siddhau yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau yasya aparasya vastunaḥ na siddhiḥ na pratītiḥ tat vastu tasya vastunaḥ liṅgam
bhavati iti ayam liṅga liṅginoḥ nyāyaḥ
tatra udāharaṇam dhūma agni vat iti

original: yathā -- yadā dhūmapratītau nāgniḥ pratīyate tadā tayor lliṅgaliṅgibhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: yathā yadā dhūma pratītau na agniḥ pratīyate tadā tayoḥ bhavati
na tu dhūma pratīti kāle eva pratīyamāne gnau
yadi nāma evam tatas kim

original: ity ata āha -- anyasya vastuno yo bhāvaḥsvabhāvaḥ tatsiddhyaiva
analyzed: iti atas āha anyasya vastunaḥ yaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ tad siddhyā eva

original: tatpratītyaiva tadabhāvaḥ tasya [S. 170b.] pratiṣedhyasyābhāvaḥ prasidhyati pratīyate anyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvātmakatvāt tatsiddher eva tatsiddhilakṣaṇatvāt
analyzed: tad pratītya eva tad abhāvaḥ tasya pratiṣedhyasya abhāvaḥ prasidhyati pratīyate anya bhāvasya eva tad abhāva ātmaka tvāt tad siddheḥ eva tad siddhi lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: naiyāyikās tu manyante -- pratiṣedhyābhāvo hi prasajyapratiṣedhātmakas tuccharūpas tasya kathaṃ tadanyabhāvarūpatā?
analyzed: naiyāyikāḥ tu manyante pratiṣedhya abhāvaḥ hi prasajya pratiṣedha ātmakaḥ tuccha rūpaḥ tasya katham tad anya bhāva rūpa tā
bhāva abhāvayoḥ virodhāt
tatas katham tad anya bhāva siddhyā eva tad abhāva siddhiḥ syāt

original: ity ata āha -- tasya tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmād anyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena  #
analyzed: iti atas āha tasya tad anya bhāvasya pradeśa lakṣaṇasya tasmāt anyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭa ādinā asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpasya rahita ātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena  /
śūnya ātmanaḥ
anena kevala pradeśasya api prasajya pratiṣedha ātmaka tām āha
katham bhāvasya tuccha rūpa tā svabhāvaḥ virodhāt

original: , iti cet; na, pararūpeṇa tasyāpi tuccharūpatvāt /
analyzed: iti ced na para rūpeṇa tasya api tuccha rūpa tvāt

original: [T. 334b.] yathā hy anapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsargaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ śūnyavikalpapratibhāsī pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpaḥ tadrūpavirahāt,

analyzed: tathā tad anya bhāvaḥ pi pratiṣedhya asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpaḥ

original: tataḥ katham asya pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpatā [S. 171a.] virudhyeta? /
analyzed: tatas katham asya pratiṣedhyena tuccha rūpa tā virudhyeta
sva rūpeṇa hi ayam na para rūpeṇa

original: anyathā katham asyānyabhāvatvaṃ parasya vā tatrābhāvaḥ syāt? /
analyzed: anyathā katham asya anya bhāva tvam parasya vā tatra abhāvaḥ syāt

original: yo hi yadabhāvarūpo na bhavati sa evāsau bhavati,
analyzed: yaḥ hi yad abhāva rūpaḥ na bhavati saḥ eva asau bhavati
tad sva rūpa vat
tatas sarvasya jagataḥ paraspara ātma tā prasaṅgaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvabhāvāḥ pararūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa rūpavattve 'pīty anavadyam /
analyzed: tasmāt sarva bhāvāḥ para rūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvaḥ sva rūpeṇa rūpavat tve pi iti anavadyam
kaḥ tarhi prasajya pratiṣedhāt paryudāsasya bhedaḥ

original: na kaścit, kevalam anapekṣitarūpāntaram abhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedha iti loke kathyate /
analyzed: na kaścid kevalam an apekṣita rūpa antaram abhāva mātram prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ iti loke kathyate
rūpa antaram tu para rūpa śūnyam paryudāsaḥ iti

original: na tu rūpāntaraṃ pararūpatucchātmakaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: na tu rūpa antaram para rūpa tuccha ātmakam na bhavati
anubhūyate eva ca rūpa antaram tad rūpa śūnyatayā

original: kathaṃ tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmatā na syāt pararūpeṇa? /

na

original: tādātmyābhāve hi prasajyapratiṣedhasya paryudastāt [S. 171b.] pratītau tatkāraṇatve sati syāt pratipattiḥ nānyathā /
analyzed: tādātmya abhāve hi prasajya pratiṣedhasya paryudastāt pratītau tad kāraṇa tve sati syāt pratipattiḥ na anyathā

original: tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya yat tattvaṃ tasya pratiṣedhyatuccharūpatāyā vyavasthāpakaṃ
analyzed: tasya tad anya a saṃsṛṣṭa rūpasya yat tattvam tasya pratiṣedhya tuccha rūpa tāyāḥ vyavasthāpakam

original: pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣarūpam tat eva -- na taduttarakālabhāvino [T. 335a.] `nāstīha ghaṭaḥ` iti vikalpāt,
analyzed: pramāṇam pratyakṣa rūpam tat eva na na asti iha ghaṭaḥ iti vikalpāt

original: tasya gṛhītagrāhitayā smṛtitvenāpramāṇatvāt -- anyasya ghaṭādes tatrāsato vyavacchedasyābhāvasya siddhes tadabhāvātmakasyaiva
analyzed: tasya gṛhīta grāhi tayā smṛti tvena apramāṇa tvāt anyasya ghaṭa ādeḥ tatra asataḥ vyavacchedasya abhāvasya siddheḥ tad abhāva ātmakasya eva
pradeśasya tena grahaṇāt

original: dvividho hy ayaṃ pradeśo ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpas tadvyāvṛttarūpatayā tato 'nyo ghaṭavān api,
analyzed: dvividhaḥ hi ayam pradeśaḥ ghaṭa asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpaḥ tad vyāvṛtta rūpatayā tatas nyaḥ ghaṭavān api
kevalaḥ ca ghaṭam prati

original: 4tasya tadvivekena[666]pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭād anyatvaṃ ghaṭavirahaś ca gṛhīta eva bhavatīti na vastvasaṃkarasiddhyarthaṃ,
analyzed: tasya grahaṇe ghaṭāt anya tvam ghaṭa virahaḥ ca gṛhītaḥ eva bhavati iti na vastu asaṃkara siddhi artham

original: `ihedaṃ nāsti` ity evam arthaṃ ca pramāṇāntaram anveṣaṇīyam /

original: vistaraś caitad uttaratra vakṣyata iti āstāṃ tāvat /
analyzed: vistaraḥ ca etat uttaratra vakṣyate iti āstām tāvat

original: yataś cānyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāva uktena nyāyena siddhyati tato nānyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya liṅgam /

na

original: atraikarthasamavāya iti saṃyogaḥ sa eva samavāyaśabdenoktaḥ

original: pareṣāṃ tv agnidhūmau svāvayaveṣv eva samavetāv iti na tayor ekārthasamavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo veti dhūmasyāgner upari darśanāl laukikaḥ sambandha  #
analyzed: pareṣām tu agni dhūmau sva avayaveṣu eva samavetau iti na tayoḥ ekārtha samavāyaḥ ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ vā iti dhūmasya agneḥ upari darśanāt laukikaḥ sambandha
uktaḥ

analyzed: nanu ca īśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kim iti naiyāyika abhimatasya api sambandhasya anya bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ abhāvaḥ ucyate

original: satyam, [S. 172b.] prasaṅgena tu tanmatasyāpi niṣedhārtham uktam /

original: pūrvaṃ hy anyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratiṣedhyābhāvasya na tadarthaṃ pratyakṣāntaraṃ `nāstīha ghaṭaḥ` ity evamākāraṃ kalpanīyam iti  #

te hi dravya ātmānaḥ dravya antaram eva ārambhante

original: [S. 174a.] evam anyabhāvatadabhāvayor viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandho bhaviṣyati [T. 337a.] pradeśākhyenānyabhāvena ghaṭābhāvasya pratyāyanād  #

original: naiva sambandhāntaranibandhano 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi tu viṣayaviṣayibhāvanimitta eveti cet;

original: tathā caikāsiddhau dvayor apy asiddhir bhaved iti /

sarvatra samudāyasya sādhya tā na evā iṣṭā iti ced

original: āha -- tathā ca dharmamātrasyāpi svatantrasya sādhyatopagame `ghaṭābhāvas tadanyabhāvāt` ity evaṃrūpe prayoge ghaṭasya sarvatra deśe sarvadā  #

atra āha paraḥ sādhya tā anya bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ

original: na ca naivāsminpakṣe liṅgasyānyabhāvātmano liṅginaśca pradeśādidharmilakṣaṇasya asambandhadoṣaḥprasajyate /

original: eva ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭapradeśādidarśanād evāsya pratipattuḥ `ghaṭo nāsti` iti vikalpo liṅgijñānatayopagato
analyzed: eva ghaṭa asaṃsṛṣṭa pradeśa ādi darśanāt eva asya pratipattuḥ ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vikalpaḥ liṅgi jñāna tayā upagataḥ
bhavati tatas saḥ eva anya bhāvaḥ

original: tataḥ kathaṃ tasyaivānyabhāvasya vyāvṛttito 'pi bhedam ananubhavato liṅgaliṅgibhāvo liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ vā? /

original: syān matam -- sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanayā [S. 176b.] liṅgaliṅgitaikasyāpi bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na cātra prakṛte 'nyabhāve sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanāsambhavati,
analyzed: syāt matam sāmānya viśeṣa kalpanayā liṅga liṅgitā ekasya api bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na ca atra prakṛte sāmānya viśeṣa bhāva kalpanā sambhavati

original: yena [T. 339b.] sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sāmānyaṃ hetur bhaved viśeṣo dharmī,

original: kuto na sambhavatīty āha -- tadviśeṣapratipatter eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣapratipatter eva tadabhāvasya ghaṭābhāvasya pratīteḥ /
analyzed: kutas na sambhavati iti āha tad viśeṣa pratipatteḥ eva ghaṭa vivikta pradeśa viśeṣa pratipatteḥ eva tad abhāvasya ghaṭa abhāvasya pratīteḥ

original: yataś ca viśeṣa eva ghaṭābhāvapratītinibandhanaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tatra sāmānyakalpanayā kriyata iti /

original: sa eva viśeṣo 'nyatra varttamānaḥ sāmānyarūpatāṃ pratipatsyata iti cet,
analyzed: saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ nyatra varttamānaḥ sāmānya rūpa tām pratipatsyate iti ced

original: āha -- tasya ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣasya anyatra sajātīye anvayasya anuvṛtter abhāvāt kutaḥ sāmānyātmatā? /
analyzed: āha tasya ghaṭa vivikta pradeśa viśeṣasya anyatra sajātīye anvayasya anuvṛtteḥ abhāvāt kutas sāmānya ātma tā

original: na hy asau deśakālāvasthāniyato viśeṣo 'nyam anvetīti /

atra eva upacaya hetum āha pratijñā artha ityādi

eva pradeśa viśeṣaḥ dharmī

analyzed: atha mā bhūt eṣa doṣaḥ iti na ghaṭa viviktaḥ eva pradeśa viśeṣaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate

original: kin tu pradeśamātraṃ ghaṭaviviktatāviśeṣarahitam ity ata āha -- na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃtatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kin tu pradeśa mātram ghaṭa vivikta tā viśeṣa rahitam iti atas āha na ca yatra pradeśa mātram tatra ghaṭa abhāvaḥ

original: yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'grataḥ sthitas tādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /

original: tathāvidhapradeśaviśeṣapratītir eva ghaṭābhāvapratītis tato 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ liṅgaliṅgitā 'nupapannety upadarśayann āha -- nanu tasyaiva  #

ityādi

original: yo 'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmitayā 'vasthāpitas tasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ity anena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,

kevala pradeśa pratipattau eva ghaṭa viraha pratītau

original: ca yad etad uttarakālaṃ `yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśas tatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ` iti [S. 177b.] anvayasyānugamāmanu(gamanam anu)
analyzed: ca yat etat uttara kālam yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśaḥ tatra tatra ghaṭa virahaḥ iti anvayasya anugamām anugamanam anu

original: saraṇam, tac ca nirarthakam ādāv eva sādhyapratīteḥ /
analyzed: saraṇam tat ca nirarthakam ādau eva sādhya pratīteḥ

original: yata evaṃ tasmād anyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedābhāvān na sādhanam abhāvasyeti sthitam /
analyzed: yatas evam tasmāt anya bhāvaḥ kevala pradeśa lakṣaṇaḥ sādhya sādhanayoḥ bheda abhāvāt na sādhanam abhāvasya iti sthitam

original: tad evaṃ [T. 340b.] samudāyasādhyatāṃ 3liṅgasya ca dharmiṇā sambandhaṃ[686]pratipādayituṃ
analyzed: tat evam samudāya sādhya tām liṅgasya ca dharmiṇā

original: yad uktaṃ pareṇa -- `pradeśādidharmiviśeṣaṇasyābhāvasya sādhanāt`[687]iti tadapṛthaksiddhidūṣaṇenaiva nirākṛtam /
analyzed: yat uktam pareṇa pradeśa ādi dharmi viśeṣaṇasya abhāvasya tad apṛthak siddhi dūṣaṇena eva nirākṛtam

original: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayor darśayann āha -- asty anyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho  #
analyzed: viṣaya viṣayi bhāvena tu sambandha pratipādane niraste paraḥ nyathā sambandham sādhya sādhanayoḥ darśayan āha asti anya bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ
virodha ākhyaḥ

original: tataḥ sambandhasadbhāvād anyabhāvād abhāvasya siddhir bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: tatas sambandha sadbhāvāt anya bhāvāt abhāvasya siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayor virodham evāsambhāvayan pṛcchati -- kena kasya virodhaḥ iti /
analyzed: siddhāntavādī tu sādhya sādhanayoḥ virodham eva asambhāvayan pṛcchati kena kasya virodhaḥ iti

original: na hy atra sādhyasādhanayor virodhaḥ saṃbhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: na hi atra sādhya sādhanayoḥ virodhaḥ saṃbhavati iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: paro virodham abhiprāyānabhijñātayā darśayati -- anyabhāvena kevalapradeśātmanā pratiyogino yasyābhāvaḥ pramātum iṣṭo ghaṭādes tasyeti /
analyzed: paraḥ virodham abhiprāya anabhijñātayā darśayati anya bhāvena kevala pradeśa ātmanā pratiyoginaḥ yasya abhāvaḥ pramātum iṣṭaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ tasya iti

original: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitām ādarśayann āha -- kiṃnu vai pratiyogī ghaṭādiḥ pramātum iṣṭo yena pratiyogināḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginor  #
analyzed: parasya evaṃvādinaḥ asambandha abhidhāyi tām ādarśayan āha kim nu vai pratiyogī ghaṭa ādiḥ pramātum iṣṭaḥ yena pratiyogināḥ prameya tvena liṅga liṅginoḥ
virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ abhidhīyate

original: naiva pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭaḥ kin tu tadabhāva iti cet,
analyzed: nā eva pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭaḥ kin tu tad abhāve iti ced
āha abhāvaḥ tu pratiyoginaḥ yaḥ sādhyaḥ
s

original: [kumārilas tu manyate bhāvāṃśād bhinno '] [S. 179a.] yam abhāvāṃśas tato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir  #
analyzed: kumārilaḥ tu manyate bhāva aṃśāt yam abhāva aṃśaḥ tatas na anya bhāvaḥ eva tad abhāvaḥ iti katham tad pratipattiḥ eva tad abhāva pratipattiḥ
iti
tathā hi ayam abhāvaḥ prāgabhāva ādi bheda bhinnaḥ

original: na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato 'yaṃ vasturūpa eva / yad āha --
analyzed: na ca avastunaḥ bhedaḥ sambhavati atas yam vastu rūpaḥ eva yat āha

original: na cāvastuna ete syur bhedās tenāsya vastutā//
analyzed: na ca avastunaḥ ete syuḥ bhedāḥ tena asya vastu tā
ślu abhāva ap iti
na ca bhāva aṃśaḥ eva abhāva aṃśaḥ yuktaḥ
tasya indriya saṃyoga balena pratīteḥ
itara pratīteḥ ca tad asaṃyoga hetuka tvāt yat āha
tad saṃyoge sat iti evam sat rūpa tvam pratīyate
na asti atrā idam iti ittham tu tad asaṃyoga hetukam
ślu abhāve iti

original: tat kathaṃ tatpratipattir evāparasya vyavacchedanam iti tannirāsārtham āha /
analyzed: tat katham tad pratipattiḥ eva aparasya vyavacchedanam iti tad nirāsa artham āha

original: tasyānyasya pradeśasya [T. 342a.] kevalasya yat tat kaivalyam ekākitvam asahāyatā
analyzed: tasya anyasya pradeśasya t kevalasya yat tat kaivalyam ekāki tvam asahāya tā

original: tad eva aparasya pratiyogino ghaṭādeḥ vaikalyam abhāva iti tasmāt tadanyabhāva eva
analyzed: tat eva aparasya pratiyoginaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ vaikalyam abhāvaḥ iti tasmāt tad anya bhāvaḥ eva

original: bhāvāṃśa eva tvad abhimataḥ tadabhāvaḥpratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaram
analyzed: bhāva aṃśaḥ eva tvat abhimataḥ tad abhāvaḥ pratiyogi abhāva aṃśaḥ na tatas pṛthak bhūtam dharma antaram
iti ucyate sugata sutaiḥ

original: tataś ca tatpratipattir eva ca tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattir eva 5ca tadapratipattiḥ[688] tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattir abhāvapratipattir iti  #
analyzed: tatas ca tad pratipattiḥ eva ca tasya anya bhāvasya pratipattiḥ eva ca tasya pratiyoginaḥ pratipattiḥ abhāva pratipattiḥ iti
yāvat

original: evaṃ manyate -- yo 'yam abhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ [S. 179a.] tadrūpavaikalyād evānubhavati  #
analyzed: evam manyate yaḥ yam abhāva aṃśaḥ bhāva aṃśāt pṛthak bhūtaḥ vastunaḥ dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭa ādi abhāva ātmaka tām tad rūpa vaikalyāt eva anubhavati  /
na anyathā
tat ca tad rūpa vaikalyam anya vastunaḥ bhāva aṃśasya api
vidyate eva
tad abhāve hi tasya anya vastu tā eva hīyeta

original: na hi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato 'nyatvam anubhavati,
analyzed: na hi yat yad rūpa vikalam na bhavati tat tatas anubhavati
yathā tasya eva svarūpam
tathā ca abhāva aṃśaḥ tasya na sidhyet

original: sarvaṃ ca viśvam ekaṃ dravyaṃ prasajyeta,
analyzed: sarvam ca viśvam ekam dravyam prasajyeta
tatas ca saha utpatti ādi prasaṅgaḥ

original: sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syād ity avaśyam anyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva /
analyzed: sarvasya ca sarvatra upayogaḥ syāt iti avaśyam anya vastunaḥ bhāva rūpa tā tad anya abhāva ātmikā eva
tathā ca tad pratipattiḥ eva

original: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyabhāvābhāvasaṃyoga [T. 342b.] iti kim ucyate --
analyzed: tad saṃyogaḥ eva ca indriyasya tad anya bhāva abhāva saṃyoga iti kim ucyate
na asti atrā idam iti ittham tu tad asaṃyoga hetukam
iti vikalpa apekṣayā uktam iti ced
tat etat abādhakam eva

original: pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyābhāvātmake[690]eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścāt yasya {p. 189.1} yathāgṛhītābhilāpino vikalpasyopagamāt /
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa tad ākāra utpattyā vastu rūpe pratipanne pāścāt yasya yathā gṛhīta abhilāpinaḥ vikalpasya upagamāt

original: vistarataś cāyam abhāvavicāraḥpramāṇadvitvasiddhāv abhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvadhārya iti /
analyzed: vistarataḥ ca ayam abhāva vicāraḥ pramāṇa dvi tva siddhau abhāvam prameyam pramāṇam ca vicārayatā vihitaḥ iti tatas eva avadhāryaḥ iti
avaśyam ca tad anya bhāva pratipattiḥ eva tad abhāva pratipattiḥ
tatas na vastu asaṅkara sidhi artham
na asti atra idam iti abhāva vyavahāra artham ca abhāva pramāṇa parikalpanā yuktā iti

original: darśayann āha -- anyathā yadi tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti neṣyate[691]tadā
analyzed: darśayan āha anyathā yadi tad pratipattiḥ eva tad abhāva pratipattiḥ iti

original: tasya anyavastunaḥ svarūpaparicchedena tato 'nyasyātadrūpasya avyavacchede anirākaraṇe
analyzed: tasya anya vastunaḥ sva rūpa paricchedena tatas nyasya a tad rūpasya a vyavacchede a nirākaraṇe

original: tadabhāvāpratipattau tatpariccheda eva na syāt -- tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattir eva na syāt /
analyzed: tad abhāva apratipattau tad paricchedaḥ eva na syāt tasya tad anya vastunaḥ svarūpa pratipattiḥ eva na syāt
kim kāraṇam

original: tadatadrūpayoḥ tasya tadanyavastuno yadrūpaṃ pratiniyataṃ sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: tad a tad rūpayoḥ tasya tad anya vastunaḥ yat rūpam pratiniyatam sakala trailokya vilakṣaṇam

original: yac cātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ avivekād avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanād
analyzed: yat ca a tad rūpam tad rūpam na bhavati para rūpam tayoḥ a vivekāt a vivecanāt vivekena a vyavasthāpanāt
asāṅkaryeṇa a prasādhanāt

original: sakalapararūpāsaṅkīrṇaṃ hi tadrūpam tac cet [T. 343a.] tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākāram[692]eva tadutpannaṃ  #
analyzed: sakala para rūpa asaṅkīrṇam hi tad rūpam tat ced t tad sāmarthya bhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā na anukṛtam kevalam tat utpannam
tadā katham tena tad paricchedaḥ

original: syāt? / na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā -- śuklaśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā  #
analyzed: syāt na hi yad rūpam yat vastu tad rūpa ananukāriṇā jñānena tad paricchedaḥ yuktaḥ yathā śukla śaṅkha rūpa ananukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pīta śaṅkha avabhāsinā  /
jñānena iti

original: pratiniyatarūpānukāre vā tatparicchedasya katham anyā 'vyavacchedo nāma? /
analyzed: pratiniyata rūpa anukāre vā tad paricchedasya katham anyā vyavacchedaḥ nāma
tatas pratiniyata rūpa an anukārāt eva tad anya a vyavacchedaḥ
tathā ca tad pariccheda abhāvaḥ iti
bhavatu evam tatas kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: ity ata āha -- ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ sarvajanapratītaḥ kasyacid agnyāder vastuno darśanāt
analyzed: iti atas āha yaḥ eṣa vyavahāraḥ sarva jana pratītaḥ kasyacid agni ādeḥ vastunaḥ darśanāt

original: kvaciddeśe tatsambandhini [S. 180b.] prāptyartho dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca parihārārthaḥpravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ sa na syāt /
analyzed: kvacid deśe tad sambandhini prāpti arthaḥ dṛṣṭasya adṛṣṭasya ca parihāra arthaḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ sa na syāt
kim kāraṇam

original: na hi yasmād ayaṃpratipattā analaṃpaśyann api saṅkīrṇatadatadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
analyzed: na hi yasmāt ayam pratipattā an alam paśyan api saṅkīrṇa tad a tad rūpa pratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa
anyathā sya darśana rūpa tā hāneḥ

original: tathā hi -- asaṅkīrṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇam api yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacid etaddarśanaṃ syāt? /
analyzed: tathā hi asaṅkīrṇasya adarśane saṅkīrṇam api yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭa ādi prakhyam katham kasyacid etat darśanam syāt

original: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇadarśanavān {p. 190.1} pratipattā katham analam eva paśyati na salilādikam? /
analyzed: saḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇa darśanavān p pratipattā katham analam eva paśyati na salila ādikam

original: kin tu saṅkīrṇarūpavastupratibhāsijñānatayā salilādikam api paśyati /
analyzed: kin tu saṅkīrṇa rūpa vastu pratibhāsi jñāna tayā salila ādikam api paśyati

original: tataḥ kathaṃ salilārthītatra agnimati pradeśe na pravarteta? /
analyzed: tatas katham agnimati pradeśe na pravarteta
parasya vacana avakāśam āśaṅkya āha
anala pratibhāsinā hi jñānena anala svarūpān eva pratīyate

original: yas tu salilābhāvaḥ sa tatra salilasyānupalambhena /
analyzed: yaḥ tu salila abhāvaḥ sa tatra salilasya anupalambhena

original: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayor vivekāl loke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
analyzed: tatas jñāna dvayena tad a tad rūpayoḥ vivekāt loke pravṛtti nivṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyataḥ vyavahāraḥ sidhyati iti

original: siddhāntavādy āha -- ko 'yam anupalambho nāma iti /
analyzed: siddhāntavādī āha kaḥ yam anupalambhaḥ nāma iti

original: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātram ity ata āha -- yadi salila ity ādi /
analyzed: kadācid paraḥ brūyāt salila upalambha viraha mātram iti atas āha yadi salile iti ādi

original: kumārilasya tu salilopalambhanivṛttimātraṃ tuccharūpam abhāvapramāṇatayā nābhimatam eva /
analyzed: kumārilasya tu salila upalambha nivṛtti mātram tuccha rūpam abhāva pramāṇa tayā na abhimatam eva
pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpattiḥ pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate
pariṇāmaḥ
iti vacanāt

original: kin tu yo 'bhāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanā 'pariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti  #
analyzed: kin tu yaḥ bhāva ātmanaḥ pratiṣedhya vastu pratibhāsi jñāna ātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sa tad anya vastu pratibhāsi jñāna sahacaritaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ na kevalaḥ iti
param abhyupagamayitum asya upanyāsaḥ
tathā ca anya vastu vijñānam eva abhāva pramāṇam astu
kim apramāṇakasya ātmanaḥ pariṇāma ākhyena dharmeṇa parikalpitena

original: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmād anya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tad anya vastu vijñāna pariṇāmāt anyaḥ eva tasya apariṇāmaḥ nāma bhavataḥ bhimataḥ bhāva antarasya eva abhāva tvena upagata tvāt

original: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
analyzed: tulya yogya tā rūpasya eka jñāna saṃsarggiṇaḥ eva ca anya vastunaḥ vijñānam tathā upeyam na anyasya
tad jñānāt pratiyogi abhāva siddheḥ

original: na hi rūpajñānād rasādyabhāvapratītir yuktamatī [T. 344a.] deśādiviprakarṣavato vā /
analyzed: na hi rūpa jñānāt rasa ādi abhāva pratītiḥ deśa ādi viprakarṣavataḥ vā
anya vastu vijñānam ca pratiniyata rūpa pratibhāsya iva

original: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
analyzed: rūpa antara avabhāsi tve hi tasya salila upalambha abhāvaḥ eva na sidhyet
evam ca pratiyogi abhāvaḥ

original: tadabhāvavyavahāre tv asmadabhimataivānupalabdhir āyāteti pratipādayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
analyzed: tad abhāva vyavahāre tu asmad abhimatā evā anupalabdhiḥ āyātā iti pratipādayitum asya upanyāsaḥ
tatra yadi salila upalambha abhāvaḥ

original: [S. 181b.] tuccharūpo 'nupalambhas tadā katham {p. 191.1} abhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pariccheda iti yāvat,
analyzed: tuccha rūpaḥ tadā katham abhāvaḥ kasyacid pratipattiḥ paricchedaḥ iti yāvat
paricchedasya jñāna dharma tvāt

original: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kin tu taddhetubhāva ity āha -- pratipattihetur vā iti /
analyzed: atha na tasya pratipatti rūpa tā iṣyate kin tu tad hetu bhāvaḥ iti āha pratipatti hetuḥ vā iti

original: na hi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na hi sarva sāmarthya viraha lakṣaṇasya abhāvasya pratipattim prati hetu bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ

original: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananād abhāvajñānam evaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
analyzed: hetu bhāve vā tasya an apekṣita sahakāriṇaḥ nityam tad jñāna jananāt abhāva jñānam eva ekam pratipattuḥ syāt
jñāna antarasya avakāśaḥ eva na bhavet

original: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktam ity āha -- tasyāpi salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
analyzed: na ca ajñātasya asya nāstitā jñāna jananam yuktam iti āha tasya api salila upalambha abhāvasya katham pratipattiḥ

original: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayam apratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacid api /
analyzed: atha ayam salila upalambha abhāvaḥ svayam apratītaḥ eva salila abhāva pratītim janayati tadā kasyacid api

original: tad evāha -- tasya salilopalambhābhāvasya tato vā salilād anyasyānalādeḥ `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` ity ata ātmano 'pariṇāmasya pṛthag avasthāpanāt,
analyzed: tat eva āha tasya salila upalambha abhāvasya tatas vā salilāt anyasya anala ādeḥ vijñānam vā iti atas pariṇāmasya pṛthak avasthāpanāt

original: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano 'pariṇāmasya [T. 344b.] tadātmakatvān na tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta /
analyzed: tatra api tad aṅgīkaraṇe ca ātmanaḥ pariṇāmasya t tad ātmaka tvāt na tatas bhedena vyavasthāpyeta

original: tataś ca kasyacid api [S. 182a.] tasya tadanyasya vā 'pratipattāv api yady abhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsv api salilādyabhāvaḥ  #
analyzed: tatas ca kasyacid api tasya tad anyasya vā pratipattau api yadi abhāvaḥ salila ādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpa ādi avasthāsu api salila ādi abhāvaḥ
kim na pratīyate
tadā api tad abhāvaḥ pratīyeta iti etat vicāritam pramāṇa viniścaye
tatas eva avadhāraṇīyam

original: vyavadhānādigrahaṇena caitaddarśayaty anyavastuno 'pi anyatvaṃ tattulyayogyatārūpāpekṣam eva,
analyzed: vyavadhāna ādi grahaṇena ca etat darśayati anya vastunaḥ anya tvam eva
na tad anapekṣam upeyam

analyzed: prakāreṇa anupalambhena salila abhāva pratītiḥ na yujyate nala pratibhāsinaḥ ca jñānasya

original: tataḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsitatvāt tadabhāvasya tadbalāt pāścātyaṃ vyavahārapravartanarūpaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ {p. 193.1} vikalpakam ājāyate /

original: yatas tadanyavastuni vijñānaṃ pratyakṣātmakam apy anavagate tadanyābhāve jñānaṃ janayat pṛthag abhāvapramāṇatayā vyavasthāpyeta /

original: tathā hi -- tadanyākāraśūnya eva tadekajñānākāraḥ saṃvedyate /

original: na hi vikalpajñānasyāpi tadākāraśūnyarūpasaṃvedanād anyat tadabhāvasaṃvedanaṃ nāma /

kevalam asya vikalpa rūpa tā eva atiricyate
tatas yathā nirvikalpa jñāna avasite kvacid

original: anale `analo 'trāsti` iti pāścātyo vikalpo vyavahārapravartanamātraṃ na tataḥ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk,

original: tasmād yad evāsmābhir abhihitaṃ tadanyābhāvapratītiṃ prati,

original: tad eva tvayā 'py abhidhīyata iti kasmāt puruṣam ivābhāti yatas tadanabhyupagamena pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇam abhyupagatam ity upahasati /

original: tathā hy agaty edānīṃ tvayocyate na madhyasthatayā anyathedam eva kiṃ na pūrvam evābhihitam?

sarvasya tatas nya svabhāva tvāt
anyathā tad anya tva hāneḥ iti
tasmāt tad ātma niyata pratibhāsa jñānam eva tad anyebhyaḥ nivarttanam

original: na hi jñānenārtho haste gṛhītvā 'nyato nivarttanīyaḥ /
analyzed: na hi jñānena arthaḥ haste gṛhītvā nyatas nivarttanīyaḥ

original: kevalam anyarūpāsaṃkīrṇasyaikasātmano 'nukaraṇam evāsyānyato [T. 248a.] nivarttanam ucyata iti /
analyzed: kevalam anya rūpa asaṃkīrṇasya eka sātmanaḥ nu karaṇam eva asya anyatas nivarttanam ucyate iti
atha anya ātmanaḥ sva viṣayam na nivarttayet

original: tadā 'sya viṣayasyānyātmanaḥ sakāśād avyavacchede pṛthag avyavasthāpane parātmano 'pi tatra paricchedaḥ syāt,
analyzed: tadā viṣayasya anya ātmanaḥ sakāśāt a vyavacchede pṛthak a vyavasthāpane tatra paricchedaḥ syāt

original: tataś cāvyavacchede 'nyātmanas tatparicchedaprasaṅgāt pravṛttinivṛttyor abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgo `na hy ayam analaṃ paśyann
analyzed: tatas ca avyavacchede tad pariccheda prasaṅgāt pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ abhāvaḥ iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ na hi ayam analam paśyan
ādikaḥ

original: na kevalam anyātmanas tannivarttayati tadātmano 'py aśeṣam anyad iti darśayann āha

original: -- taṃca agrataḥ sthitaṃ deśākālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadanyadeśādibhyo vyāvṛttātmanaḥ

tatas pṛthakkaroti

original: kasmāt punar anyadeśāditāṃ tataḥ pṛthagavasthāpayati ity ata āha -- evaṃhi yasmād anyadeśatādes tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇe sati taddeśādiniyataḥ padārthaḥ  #
analyzed: kasmāt punar anya deśa ādi tām tatas pṛthak avasthāpayati iti atas āha evam hi yasmāt anya deśa tā ādeḥ tatas pṛthakkaraṇe sati tad deśa ādi niyataḥ padārthaḥ  /

tad rūpasya eva anukārāt

original: yady anyathābhāvo 'nyadeśāditā tadrūpānanukārād vyavacchinnaḥ -- bhavati tathātvaṃ ca taddeśādiniyatatvaṃ ca,

analyzed: tadā tasya eva dṛśyamānasya bhavati na anyasya anya deśa ādimataḥ

original: yata evam iti tasmād anyathābhūtād anyadeśādimatas tathābhūtaṃ

original: taddeśādimaṃtaṃ vyavacchindaty eva [S. 186b.] nivarttayanty eva tat paricchinattīti pūrvakasyopasaṃhāraḥ /

original: tathā tathābhūtād anyathābhūtaṃvyavacchindaty eva iti dvitīyasyopasaṃhāraḥ kārya iti /

original: evam uktena nyāyena ekasya pramāṇasya pratyakṣasyānumānasya vā tasyāpy evam eva svaviṣayaparicchedād vṛttiḥ pravṛttiḥ sarvabhāvān dvairāśye  #
analyzed: evam uktena nyāyena ekasya pramāṇasya pratyakṣasya anumānasya vā tasya api evam eva sva viṣaya paricchedāt vṛttiḥ pravṛttiḥ sarva bhāvān dvairāśye  /
tattve nyatve ca vyavasthāpayati
kim tad arthikayā pi abhāva kalpanayā iti

original: {p. 197.1} nanu ca vikalpavyāpāra eṣa `idam anyātmakaṃ na bhavati anyathaitad ātmakam` iti /
analyzed: nanu ca vikalpa vyāpāraḥ eṣaḥ idam anya ātmakam na bhavati anyathā etat ātmakam iti

original: pratyakṣaṃ ca nirvikalpakam iṣyate tat katham asāṃkaryasiddhis tataḥ?
analyzed: pratyakṣam ca nirvikalpakam iṣyate tat katham asāṃkarya siddhiḥ tatas
iti atas āha tasya anvaya ityādi

original: tad dhi pratyakṣaṃ vidhipratiṣedhavikalpau yadā svaviṣaye janayati tadaivāsya sāphalyam,

atas paricchede pi bhrānti kāraṇa sadbhāvāt

original: kṣāṇikatādāvanvayavyatirekabuddhī janayitum asāmarthyāt tatrāsya prāmāṇyaṃ neṣyata iti /
analyzed: kṣāṇika tā ādau anvaya vyatireka buddhī janayitum asāmarthyāt tatra asya prāmāṇyam na iṣyate iti

original: syān matam -- dvairāśyasādhane 'py asāṃkaryasiddhyarthā mā bhūd abhāvapramāṇakalpanā kin tu prakārāntarābhāvasiddhyarthā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: syāt matam dvairāśya sādhane pi asāṃkarya siddhi arthā mā bhūt abhāva pramāṇa kalpanā kin tu prakāra antara abhāva siddhi arthā bhaviṣyati

original: na hi tadabhāvasiddhau pratyakṣasya kaścid vyāpāraḥ [S. 187a.] pratipādita iti ata āha -- tadvyatiriktetyādi /
analyzed: na hi tad abhāva siddhau pratyakṣasya kaścid vyāpāraḥ pratipāditaḥ iti atas āha tad vyatirikta ityādi

original: tasmāt paridṛśyamānād vyatiriktasyāśeṣasya vastuno vyavacchedena tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇenānyatvena yā vyāptis tatsādhanād eva prakārāntarasya tattvānyatvabahirbhūtasyābhāvaḥ  #
analyzed: tasmāt paridṛśyamānāt vyatiriktasya aśeṣasya vastunaḥ vyavacchedena tatas pṛthakkaraṇena anyatvena yā vyāptiḥ tad sādhanāt eva prakāra antarasya tattva anyatva bahis bhūtasya abhāvaḥ
sidhyati
tatas tad artham api na abhāva pramāṇa kalpanā yuktā iti

original: atha matam -- sarvasyāparidṛṣṭasya dṛśyamānād anyatayā vyāptiṃ naiva pratyakṣaṃ sādhayati tat kutas tṛtīyarāśyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣata eva syāt,
analyzed: atha matam sarvasya a paridṛṣṭasya dṛśyamānāt anya tayā vyāptim na eva pratyakṣam sādhayati tat kutas tṛtīya rāśi abhāvaḥ pratyakṣataḥ eva syāt

original: yato 'bhāvaprāmāṇyakalpanā vyarthā bhaved ity ata āha -- tasya tṛtīyarāśitayā kalpyamānasya
analyzed: yatas bhāva prāmāṇya kalpanā vyarthā bhavet iti atas āha tasya tṛtīya rāśi tayā kalpyamānasya

original: tato dṛṣṭād anyatayā vyaptyabhāve tena pratyakṣeṇa tato[709] 'rthāt svaviṣayasya
analyzed: tatas dṛṣṭāt anya tayā vyapti abhāve tena pratyakṣeṇa rthāt sva viṣayasya
a vyavacchedāt a pṛthakkaraṇāt

original: tadarthasya ca rāśyantaratvena kalpyamānasya svaviṣayād avyavacchedāt apṛthakkaraṇāt punar api bhāvasya svaviṣayasyāparicchedaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tad arthasya ca rāśi antara tvena kalpyamānasya sva viṣayāt avyavacchedāt apṛthakkaraṇāt punar api bhāvasya sva viṣayasya apariccheda prasaṅgāt

original: [T. 349b.] sa hi tadviṣayaḥ sakalapararūpāsaṃkīrṇātmā yadi tenātmanā na paricchinnaḥ kathaṃ tena tasya paricchedaḥ? /
analyzed: sa hi tad viṣayaḥ sakala para rūpa asaṃkīrṇa ātmā yadi tena ātmanā na paricchinnaḥ katham tena tasya paricchedaḥ

original: tenātmanā paricchede vā kathaṃ sarvasya tadanyatayā vyāptyasādhanam?
analyzed: tena ātmanā paricchede vā katham sarvasya tad anya tayā vyāpti asādhanam
anyathā ekasya api tad anya tvam na syāt
nimittasya samāna tvāt iti

original: vastuni dṛṣṭatadanyatvena tasyānyasya tatrāparicchidyamānasyānyatvaṃ tadanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭāt tadanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭatadanyatvaṃ tena sarvasya tadvyatiriktasya  #

original: tad anyasyaiva ca yad anyan na bhavati puro 'vasthitaṃ sakalaparabhāvavyāvṛttaṃ tasyaiva tattvena dṛśyamānaprakāratayā vyavasthāpanād iti /

original: amum eva nyāyam anyatrāpy atidiśann āha -- etena kramākramādayaḥ ityādi /

original: etena anantaroktena nyāyena pratiniyataikapadārtharūpānukāriṇī buddhir upajāyamānā

original: tadviparītarūpaṃ sarvaṃ svaviṣayād vyavacchindatī dvairāśyaṃ tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ
