original: ca sādhayatīti[711]ye kecid anyonyavyavacchedarūpāḥ kramākramanityānityādayaḥ te vyākhyātāḥ /
analyzed: ca kecid anyonya vyavaccheda rūpāḥ kramākrama nitya anitya ādayaḥ te vyākhyātāḥ

original: {p. 199.1} tathā hi -- kāryasya kramamananyasahāyatāṃ pratiyaty eva buddhis tasyākramaṃ kāryāntarasāhityaṃ [T. 350b.] tataḥ pṛthakkaroti /
analyzed: tathā hi kāryasya kramam ananya sahāya tām pratiyatī eva buddhiḥ tasya akramam kārya antara sāhityam t tatas pṛthakkaroti

original: tataḥ kramākramatayā dvaitasiddheḥ tṛtīyasya prakārasya sambhavo nirasto bhavati /
analyzed: tatas kramākrama tayā dvaita siddheḥ tṛtīyasya prakārasya sambhavaḥ nirastaḥ bhavati
krama bhāva vyatirekiṇaḥ sarvasya kārya janmanaḥ tad anya tayā dvitīya prakāra tayā avasthānāt

original: evam udayānantaradhvaṃsitā [S. 188b.] kṣaṇikatocyata iti pratīyatī vyavasthāpanākāla
analyzed: evam udaya anantara dhvaṃsi tā kṣaṇika tā ucyate iti

original: eva buddhis tadviparītarūpatāyāḥ svaviṣayād apākaraṇāt tato 'nyatvena prakārāntare
analyzed: eva buddhiḥ tad viparīta rūpa tāyāḥ sva viṣayāt apākaraṇāt tatas nyatvena prakāra antare
vasthāpanāt

original: tad evam ekapramāṇanibandhanām asāṅkaryasiddhiṃ pratipādyopasaṃharayann āha -- tad
analyzed: tat evam eka pramāṇa nibandhanām asāṅkarya siddhim pratipādya upasaṃharayan āha tat

original: evam uktena nyāyena ekasya pratiniyatātmana upalambhāt tasyopalabhyamānasya yas tato
analyzed: evam uktena nyāyena ekasya pratiniyata ātmanaḥ upalambhāt tasya upalabhyamānasya yaḥ

original: 'nyas tattulyayogyatārūpas tadviparīto vā tadrūpavikalas tadātmano vyavacchedaḥ pṛthakkaraṇaṃ
analyzed: tad tulya yogyatā rūpaḥ tad viparītaḥ vā tad rūpa vikalaḥ tad ātmanaḥ vyavacchedaḥ pṛthakkaraṇam
tasya upalabhyamānasya an upalabhyamāna svabhāvāt rūpa antareṇa pratibhāsanāt

original: tathā tasya svaviṣayasya tadanyātmatāyā bhāvapradhānatvān nirdeśasya vyavacchedo bhavati asāṅkaryaṃ sidhyati /

original: tad yady etad aviśeṣaṇānyasya sarvasya tatrābhāvasiddhiḥ syād ity atrābhimataṃ tadā siddhasādhanam,

original: yataḥ sarvam aviśeṣeṇaiva tad ekākārayā budhyā tadrūpavikalaṃ svaviṣayād avacchidyate,
analyzed: yatas sarvam aviśeṣeṇa eva tat eka ākārayā budhyā tad rūpa vikalam sva viṣayāt avacchidyate

original: atha taddeśakālayor abhāvaḥ sarvasya [T. 351a.][S. 189a.] tadviparītarūpasya vyavacchedo
analyzed: atha tad deśa kālayoḥ abhāvaḥ sarvasya t tad viparīta rūpasya

original: 'bhimataḥ sa na yukta iti darśayati -- na taddeśakālayoḥ yatrāsau pratiniyatātmā
analyzed: bhimataḥ sa na yuktaḥ iti darśayati na tad deśa kālayoḥ yatra asau pratiniyata ātmā

original: sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaḥ padārtha upalabhyate tatra sarvasyānyasya bhāvasya tattulyayogyatārūpasyetarasya
analyzed: sakala trailokya vilakṣaṇaḥ padārthaḥ upalabhyate tatra sarvasya anyasya bhāvasya tad tulya yogyatā rūpasya itarasya

original: yena hi kāraṇena tattulyayogyatārūpasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya pratiṣedhas tasmin
analyzed: yena hi kāraṇena tad tulya yogya tā rūpasya tatra apratibhāsamānasya pratiṣedhaḥ tasmin

original: sati tad ekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatter asaṃbhavāt tad[713]abhāvanāntarīyikā 3sā bhavantī
analyzed: sati tat eka rūpa niyatāyāḥ pratipatteḥ asaṃbhavāt sā bhavantī

original: ca na sambhavatīti kathaṃ tadabhāvaḥ sidhyet /

analyzed: etat eva upasaṃharan āha tasmāt a tad ātmā ca sarvaḥ tad viparīta rūpaḥ

analyzed: sati api tasmin svabhāva ādi viprakarṣeṇa pramāṇa pañcaka apravṛtti sambhavāt iti

original: tad evaṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpayya yad uktaṃpareṇa `sa evānyabhāvas tadviṣayā copalabdhiḥ
analyzed: tat evam prāsaṅgikam parisamāpayya yat uktam pareṇa saḥ eva anya bhāvaḥ tad viṣayā ca upalabdhiḥ

original: tadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam`[715]iti tatrānyabhāvasya tadabhāvaṃ prati liṅgatve
analyzed: tad abhāvasya kim na tatra anya bhāvasya tad abhāvam prati liṅga tve

original: niraste tadviṣayāyā upalabdher nirākurvann āha -- anyabhāvaviṣayetyādi /
analyzed: niraste tad viṣayāyāḥ upalabdheḥ nirākurvan āha anya bhāva viṣaya ityādi

original: yat punar uktam -- anyabhāvaviṣayopalabdhis tadabhāvasya kinna sādhanam`[716]iti sā tadabhāvasya sādhikeṣṭaivāsmākam,
analyzed: yat punar uktam anya bhāva viṣaya upalabdhiḥ tad abhāvasya kin na sā tad abhāvasya sādhikā iṣṭā eva asmākam
na tu liṅga tvena yathā uktavān asi
kim kāraṇam

original: yataḥ tatrāpy anyabhāvaviṣayāyām[717]upalabdhāv 'bhāvasya pṛthag anyabhāvāt sādhyatve kalpyamāne sambandhābhāvasya tadabhāvena tulyatvāt /
analyzed: yatas tatra api bhāvasya pṛthak anya bhāvāt sādhya tve kalpyamāne sambandha abhāvasya tad abhāvena tulya tvāt

original: na hi tasyā api anyabhāvarūpāyāḥ tadabhāvena kaścid ekārthasamavāyādirūpaḥ sambandho 'stīti /
analyzed: na hi tasyāḥ api anya bhāva rūpāyāḥ tad abhāvena kaścid ekārtha samavāya ādi rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ sti iti

original: apṛthak siddher ity asyāpi tulyatāṃ darśayann -- āha liṅgāvirbhāvetyādi /
analyzed: apṛthak siddheḥ iti asya api tulya tām darśayan āha liṅga āvirbhāva ityādi

original: yeyam anyabhāvaviṣayā upalabdhir lliṅgatayocyate tasyās {p. 201.1} tadviviktapradeśākārāyā [T. 352a.] āvirbhāvakāla eva 2janmakāle pratītikāla  #
analyzed: yā iyam anya bhāva viṣayā upalabdhiḥ lliṅgatayā ucyate tasyāḥ āvirbhāva kāle eva janma kāle pratīti kāla
tad abhāva siddheḥ ca
tathā hi tad pratibhāsa vivikta anya bhāva pratibhāsa buddhi saṃvedanam eva tad abhāva saṃvedanam iti

original: tad eva sādhayati -- na hy anyasya tadviviktasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya pratipattā punar
analyzed: tat eva sādhayati na hi anyasya tad viviktasya bhāvam pratipadya pratipattā punar
uttarakālam tad pratipatteḥ anya bhāva pratipatteḥ tad abhāvena anya vyatirekau prasādhya
pratibindha sādhakena pramāṇena tad abhāvam pratipadyate
kim tarhi
tad anyam tad vivikta rūpam pratipadyamānaḥ eva tasya pratiyoginaḥ
tasya eva tad abhāva ātmaka tvāt

original: tathā hi -- saghaṭapradeśāsaṃkīrṇarūpasya [S. 190b.] kevalapradeśasya darśanam eva ghaṭābhāvadarśanam /
analyzed: tathā hi sa ghaṭa pradeśa asaṃkīrṇa rūpasya kevala pradeśasya darśanam eva ghaṭa abhāva darśanam

original: na hi `ghaṭo 'tra nāsti` `ghaṭavānayaṃ na bhavati` `saghaṭād anyaḥ` ity arthabhedaḥ
analyzed: na hi ghaṭaḥ na asti ghaṭavān ayam na bhavati sa ghaṭāt anyaḥ iti artha bhedaḥ

original: kaścit / tataḥ saghaṭād anyatayā kevalapradeśasya darśanam eva ghaṭābhāvadarśanam iti /
analyzed: kaścid tatas sa ghaṭāt anya tayā kevala pradeśasya darśanam eva ghaṭa abhāva darśanam iti
ghaṭaḥ tra na asti iti jñānam gṛhīta grāhi tayā smṛtiḥ eva iti
katham jñāyate iti ced
darśana anantaram anvaya vyatireka sādhana lakṣaṇena vyavadhānena vinā idam ghaṭa viviktam

original: pradeśavastv asti` `idaṃ tu ghaṭavastu nāsti` iti pāścātyena vikalpadvayena vyavasthāpanāt[720] /
analyzed: pradeśa vastu asti idam tu ghaṭa vastu na asti iti pāścātyena vikalpa dvayena
tatas na anvaya vyatireka anusaraṇam atra asti iti
kim ca dṛṣṭānta ra asiddhe sva ātmani abhāva viṣaya upalabdhiḥ tad abhāvasya

original: tad eva vyatirekamukhena darśayati -- tac ca tasya ityādi /
analyzed: tat eva vyatireka mukhena darśayati tat ca tasya ityādi
iha api asti eva anvayaḥ iti ced
āha na hi evaṃśakyam ityādi

original: tad ekopalabdheḥ tasyaikasyānanyasaṃsarggiṇo yopalabdhir viśeṣarūpā tasyāḥ kvacid apy anyatrābhāvāt /
analyzed: tat eka upalabdheḥ tasya ekasya ananya saṃsarggiṇaḥ yā upalabdhiḥ viśeṣa rūpā tasyāḥ kvacid api anyatra abhāvāt

original: atha tadviviktopalabdhisāmānyaṃ hetur ucyate -- yatra yatra ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalabdhis
analyzed: atha tad vivikta upalabdhi sāmānyam hetuḥ ucyate yatra yatra ghaṭa vivikta bhū tala upalabdhiḥ

original: tatra [S. 191a.] tatra ghaṭābhāvo yathā pūrvānubhūte ghaṭavivikte pradeśa ity āha
analyzed: tatra tatra ghaṭa abhāvaḥ yathā pūrva anubhūte ghaṭa vivikte pradeśe iti āha

original: -- sāmānyena pradarśane kriyamāṇe dṛṣṭānte 'pi pūrvānubhūtaghaṭavivikte pradeśe ghaṭābhāvasya
analyzed: sāmānyena pradarśane kriyamāṇe dṛṣṭānte pi pūrva anubhūta ghaṭa vivikte pradeśe ghaṭa abhāvasya

original: kiṃ tu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya {p. 202.1} sādhikā /

original: [724] anyabhāvo 'nupalambhena siddho yaḥ sa katham anupalabdhiḥ? ity āha
analyzed: anya bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ yaḥ sa katham anupalabdhiḥ iti āha

original: tad evam anupalabdher aśeṣavipratipattinirākaraṇena svarūpam avasthāpya prabhedanirddeśārtham āha -- seyaṃyatoktātridhā'nupalabdhiḥ /

katham

original: siddhe tatprasādhakena pramāṇena kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇasyānupalabdhiḥ /

original: tathā, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ tatprasādhanapramāṇabalenaiva siddhābhāvasyaiva vyāpakasya nānyasya vyāpakānupalabdher evāsiddhatāprasaṅgād
analyzed: tathā vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva siddhau satyām tad prasādhana pramāṇa balena eva siddha abhāvasya eva vyāpakasya na anyasya vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ eva asiddha tā prasaṅgāt

evam trividhā nupalabdhiḥ

original: kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇavyāpakayor abhāvavyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatas tayoḥ siddhābhāvatocyata
analyzed: katham punar kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ abhāva vyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatas tayoḥ siddha abhāva tā ucyata

original: [T. 353b.] ity āha -- tatra kāraṇavyāpakayor api na kevalaṃ yasya sākṣād abhāvavyavahāraḥ sādhyate /
analyzed: t iti āha tatra kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ api na kevalam yasya sākṣāt abhāva vyavahāraḥ sādhyate

original: svabhāvānupalabdhau svabhāvasyāsadvyavahārasya siddhir anyasya tadviviktasya bhāvasiddhir yā saivāsadvyavahārasiddhihetutvād evam ucyate /
analyzed: svabhāva anupalabdhau svabhāvasya asat vyavahārasya siddhiḥ anyasya tad viviktasya bhāva siddhiḥ yā sā eva asat vyavahāra siddhi hetu tvāt evam ucyate
sa kāraṇa vyāpaka abhāvaḥ tathā asiddhaḥ
nyabhāva siddhyā pratyakṣa rūpayā siddhaḥ bhāva vyavahāraḥ kārya vyāpyayoḥ pratiṣedhyayoḥ

original: yadā 'nayor virūpaviṣayatayā {p. 203.1} saviśeṣāṇām upalabdhir na sidhyati tadā'bhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃvāsādhayati /
analyzed: yadā nayoḥ virūpa viṣaya tayā sa viśeṣāṇām upalabdhiḥ na sidhyati tadā abhāvam abhāva vyavahāram vā a sādhayati
samuccaya arthaḥ vā śabdaḥ

original: atha kiṃ svabhāvānupalabdhāv apy abhāvo liṅgatayā sādhyata ity āha -- svabhāvānupalabdhau tu ityādi /
analyzed: atha kim svabhāva anupalabdhau api abhāvaḥ liṅgatayā sādhyate iti āha svabhāva anupalabdhau tu ityādi
abhāva vyavahāraḥ eva
na abhāvaḥ pi tasya pratyakṣa siddha tvāt

original: atra parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- yadi tarhi kāraṇavyāpakau siddho 'sadvyavahāro yayoḥ tau santau /

kena

original: tadanyasya karaṇavyāpakaviviktasya bhāvasya siddhir yā pratyakṣātmikā tadrūpayā 'nupalabdhyā,
analyzed: tad anyasya karaṇa vyāpaka viviktasya bhāvasya siddhiḥ yā pratyakṣa ātmikā tad rūpayā nupalabdhyā

analyzed: sā ca anya bhāva upalabdhiḥ tayoḥ kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptau eva satyām

original: asadvyavahārasya sādhikā nānyathā ity evam iṣyamāṇe [T. 354a.][S. 192b.] sati kathaṃ
analyzed: asat vyavahārasya sādhikā na anyathā iti evam iṣyamāṇe t
tayoḥ kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhyoḥ parokṣe rthe viṣaye prayogaḥ

original: yadā kāryasvabhāvahetvor vyatirekaprayogaḥ kriyate -- yatra yatrāgnir nāsti tatra tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti,
analyzed: yadā kārya svabhāva hetvoḥ vyatireka prayogaḥ kriyate yatra yatra agniḥ na asti tatra tatra na asti

original: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣo nāsti kṣaṇikatā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā nāsti sattvaṃ vā ity aśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa vyatirekaprayoge sati /
analyzed: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣaḥ na asti kṣaṇika tā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā na asti sattvam vā iti aśeṣa padārtha parigraheṇa vyatireka prayoge sati
na hi tadā agni vṛkṣa vyatiriktāḥ sarve rthāḥ pratyakṣa tā akṣā
akṣaṇika tā vā
tatas ca katham
na upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tā siddhā

original: tathā ca katham aśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kāryasvabhāvahetvor vyatirekaḥ sidhyet? /
analyzed: tathā ca katham aśeṣa upasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kārya svabhāva hetvoḥ vyatirekaḥ sidhyet

original: tasmāt kvacid adarśanamātrād eva vyatireka eṣṭavyaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt kvacid adarśana mātrāt eva vyatirekaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ
kvacid ca darśana mātrāt anvayaḥ

original: siddhāntavādy āha -- naiva parokṣe 'rthe kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ prayogo [S. 193.a]
analyzed: siddhāntavādī āha na eva parokṣe rthe kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhyoḥ

original: darśanādarśanabalena tu sādhane yatraivaikadarśane paro dṛṣṭo 'darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatraiva tasya bhāvo 'bhāvo vā bhavatu sarvatra tu kasmād  #

original: na hy apratibaddhātmanāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ kvacit tathābhāvadarśane 'pi sarvatra tathābhāvo bhavati,

original: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacid ekabhāvābhāvayor aparasya [S. 193b.] bhāvābhāvadarśanaṃ yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe / tathā
analyzed: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacid eka bhāva abhāvayoḥ aparasya bhāva abhāva darśanam yadṛcchā saṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe tathā

original: pramāṇasiddhe saty avaśyam eva yatra yatra kāryaṃ tatra tatra kāraṇam,
analyzed: pramāṇa siddhe sati avaśyam eva yatra yatra kāryam tatra tatra kāraṇam

original: yatra yatra tadabhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasyāpy abhāvo 'nyathā kāraṇam antareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasyāhetutaiva syāt /
analyzed: yatra yatra tad abhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasya api abhāvaḥ nyathā kāraṇam antareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasya ahetutā eva syāt

original: tathā yatra yatra yatsvabhāvas tatra tatra tadbhāvaḥ[726]anyathā tasya nairātmyam

original: eva syād iti vyāptyaivānvayavyatirekopadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayituṃ śakyate nānyatheti

agnivṛkṣa

analyzed: na anyatra iti pratipādya upasaṃharan āha iti eṣaḥ eva s svabhāva kārya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇaḥ

original: yataś cānvayavyatirekavān pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇasadbhāvād uktena nyāyena iti tasmāt tadaṃśena vyāpto 'nvayavyatirekaniścayenaiva tadaṃśavyāpter  #
analyzed: yatas ca anvaya vyatirekavān pratibandha prasādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāvāt uktena nyāyena iti tasmāt tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ nvaya vyatireka niścayena eva tad aṃśa vyāpteḥ
niścayāt yathā uktam prāk

original: [T. 355b.] tataś ca tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt trilakṣaṇa eva trirūpa eva trividha eva
analyzed: t tatas ca tad aṃśa vyāpti vacanāt tri lakṣaṇaḥ eva tri rūpaḥ eva trividhaḥ eva

original: hetur ggamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo vā yathoktatrairūpyasadbhāve rūpāntarasya vaiyarthyāt
analyzed: hetuḥ ggamakaḥ na anya lakṣaṇaḥ nyaḥ vā yathā ukta trairūpya sadbhāve rūpa antarasya vaiyarthyāt

original: kasmāt trilakṣāṇa eva trividha eva hetur ggamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo veti darśayati svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārād iti trilakṣaṇasyaiva svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt
analyzed: kasmāt eva trividhaḥ eva hetuḥ ggamakaḥ na anya lakṣaṇaḥ nyaḥ vā iti darśayati sva sādhya dharma avyabhicārāt iti tri lakṣaṇasya eva sva sādhya dharma avyabhicārāt

original: / svasādhyadharmāvyabhicāra eva ca gamakatvam iti rūpāntarakalpanā vyarthā /
analyzed: sva sādhya dharma avyabhicāraḥ eva ca gamaka tvam iti rūpa antara kalpanā vyarthā
pratibandha nibandhana anvaya vyatireka apagame ca rūpa antara kalpanāyām api sva sādhya dharma avyabhicāra abhāvāt

original: tad anena `tridhaiva sa` ity asya trilakṣaṇa eva sa hetur avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya
analyzed: tat anena tridhā eva saḥ iti asya tri lakṣaṇaḥ eva sa hetuḥ avinābhāvasya sva sādhya dharma avyabhicārasya
niyamāt tayā sadbhāvāt

original: ca rūpāntarakalpanāyām api hetvābhāsās tato 'pare yathoktatrilakṣaṇād apare rūpāntarayogitayā

vikalpyamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ t avinābhāvasya sva sādhya dharma avyabhicārasya teṣu

sadbhāvāt asya eva svabhāva kārya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇāḥ pada tvāt

original: yaduktaṃ `trilakṣaṇa eva hetur nānyalakṣaṇaḥ` iti tatra pareṣāṃ vipratipattiṃ darśayann āha -- ṣaḍlakṣaṇo hetur ity aparenaiyāyika-mīmāṃsakādayo  #
analyzed: yat uktam tri lakṣaṇaḥ eva hetuḥ na anya lakṣaṇaḥ iti tatra pareṣām vipratipattim darśayan āha ṣaṣ lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ iti apare naiyāyika mīmāṃsaka ādayaḥ
manyante

original: kāni punaḥ ṣaḍrūpāṇi hetos tair iṣyaṃte?

iti āha trīṇi ca etāni pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka ākhyāni

original: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam aparaṃ rūpam /

original: ekā saṃkhyā yasya {p. 206.1} hetudravyasya tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitam ekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyam āśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ  #
analyzed: ekā saṃkhyā yasya hetu dravyasya tat eka saṃkhyam vivakṣitam eka saṃkhyam hetu dravyam āśraya tvena yasya hetu sāmānyasya tat vivakṣita eka saṃkhyam
tad bhāvaḥ param rūpam

original: yady ekasaṃkhyāvyavacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyām api 1dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyām
analyzed: yadi eka saṃkhyā vyavacchinnāyām prati hetu rahitāyām hetu vyaktau hetu tvam bhavati tadā gamaka tvam na tu prati hetu sahitāyām api dvi saṃkhyā yuktāyām
hetvantaram na upadarśyate iti yāvat

original: tatraiteṣu rūpāntareṣu yad etad abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nāma tat tāvat pratibandhanibandhanānvayavyatirekātmakā 'vinābhāvasambhave sati tataḥ pṛthag  #

anyat lakṣaṇam na bhavati

atra ca sādhya dharmaḥ katham na bhavet

original: etad eva vyanakti -- yasya hetor ddharmiṇy asaty api sādhyadharme bhāva iṣyate,
analyzed: etat eva vyanakti yasya hetoḥ asati api sādhya dharme bhāvaḥ iṣyate

original: tasmād abādhāyāṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve tanniyatasya sādhyābhāvasyāpy abhāvāt sādhyasiddheḥ bhavaty eveti vyartha eva hetur iti nopanyasanīya  #

original: pakṣa iṣyate tad apy abādhāyāḥ sāmarthyaviraha iti darśayann āha -- aniyame bādhakapramāṇavṛttau

original: na ca -- bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ iti na sādhyasādhane sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ satyām api sādhyābhāvasya smbhavād iti  #
analyzed: na ca bādhakam pramāṇam syāt sādhya abhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ iti na sādhya sādhane sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ satyām api sādhya abhāvasya iti

original: yad uktam -- abādhayaiva sādhyasiddher vyartho hetuḥ iti tatrānyathārtham abādhāyā darśayan hetusāmarthyaṃ pratipādayann āhaparaḥ-- na bādhāyā  #
analyzed: yat uktam abādhayā eva sādhya siddheḥ vyarthaḥ hetuḥ iti tatra anyathā artham abādhāyāḥ darśayan hetu sāmarthyam pratipādayan āha paraḥ na bādhāyāḥ

kim tarhi

original: sā ca tadanupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya śaktivaikalyāt kvacid deśādau bādhāyā sambhave 'pi syāt /

analyzed: paraḥ pṛcchati katham iti kena prakāreṇa yathā bādhā avinābhāvayoḥ saha anavasthānam tathā prati hetu avinābhāvayoḥ api
yena eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā tadvat eva pratyākhyāyeta iti
siddhāntavādī sāmyam ekaḥ ityādi
ekaḥ hi hetuḥ lakṣaṇa yuktaḥ
sva sādhya avyabhicārī katham bhavati
yadi sva sādhya bhāvaḥ eva bhavet
anyathā tad lakṣaṇam avinābhāvaḥ nāma hīyeta

original: atraiva dharmiṇi sa tallakṣaṇa eko bhavati tatraiva dharmiṇi tasmād anyo 'pi pratihetur viruddhastena hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ bhavati? /
analyzed: atra eva dharmiṇi sa tad lakṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ bhavati tatra eva dharmiṇi tasmāt anyaḥ pi pratihetuḥ viruddhaḥ tena hetu lakṣaṇa yuktaḥ katham bhavati

original: ekasya 3hetor yat sādhyaṃ[742]tadbādhakasya tadviruddhasyāparasya dharmasya bhāva
analyzed: ekasya hetoḥ yat tad viruddhasya aparasya dharmasya bhāva

original: eva nābhāve bhāvād avinābhāvād iti bādhayā samānaṃ bādhāsambhavena samānaḥ pratihetur
analyzed: eva na abhāve bhāvāt avinābhāvāt iti bādhayā samānam bādhā sambhavena samānaḥ pratihetuḥ
iti s nirastaḥ iti

original: atraiva dūṣaṇāntaram abhidhātuṃ vikalpayann āha -- api ca ityādi /
analyzed: atra eva dūṣaṇa antaram abhidhātum vikalpayan āha api ca ityādi

original: `vastutaḥ` paramārthato yasya pratihetur na sambhavati -- kim asau samyagjñānasya
analyzed: vastutas paramārthataḥ yasya pratihetuḥ na sambhavati kim asau samyak jñānasya

original: viparyayasya vopanyastasādhyaviparītajñānasya vā hetur iṣṭo [T. 362b.] yato vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ tallakṣaṇam ucyate,
analyzed: viparyayasya vā upanyasta sādhya viparīta jñānasya vā hetuḥ yatas vivakṣita eka saṃkhya tvam tat lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: āhosvid yasya pratihetus tatsādhyaviparītasādhako na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ sann apīti /
analyzed: āhosvit yasya pratihetuḥ tad sādhya viparīta sādhakaḥ na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ san api iti

original: paro doṣam apaśyann āha -- kiñcataḥ ityādi /
analyzed: paraḥ doṣam a paśyan āha kiñcatas ityādi

original: yadi nāma pūrvo vikalpa uttaro vā tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? iti[743]/
analyzed: yadi nāma pūrvaḥ vikalpaḥ uttaraḥ vā tatas kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: {p. 214.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- yady asambhavan pratihetur yasya sa samyagjñānādihetur iṣyate,
analyzed: siddhāntavādī āha yadi asambhavān pratihetuḥ yasya sa samyak jñāna ādi hetuḥ iṣyate
tadā lakṣaṇam etat vivakṣita eka saṃkhyatvam

original: kasmāt? aśakyo niścayo yasya vastuto 'sambhavat pratihetutvasya sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt aśakyaḥ niścayaḥ yasya sambhavat pratihetu tvasya sa tathā uktaḥ
paramatā apekṣayā ca etat ucyate

original: paro hi darśanādarśanābhyām asaty api pratibandhe 'vinābhāvam icchati /
analyzed: paraḥ hi darśana adarśanābhyām asati api pratibandhe vinābhāvam icchati

original: paro hi darśanādarśanābhyām asaty api pratibandhe 'vinābhāvam icchati /
analyzed: paraḥ hi darśana adarśanābhyām asati api pratibandhe vinābhāvam icchati
tatas tasya pratihetoḥ evaṃvidhasya sambhavaḥ asti

original: sa cānupalabhyamāno 'pi kadācit syād iti vastutas tadabhāvo niścīyate /
analyzed: sa ca anupalabhyamānaḥ pi kadācid syāt iti vastutas tad abhāvaḥ niścīyate

original: pratibandhanibandhanāvinābhāvavādināṃ tv asmākaṃ [S. 203a.] pratihetvasambhavaḥ suniścita eva /
analyzed: pratibandha nibandhana avinābhāva vādinām tu asmākam prati hetu asambhavaḥ su niścitaḥ eva

original: na hi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tannimittāvinābhāvitayā
analyzed: na hi tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tad nimitta avinābhāvi tayā

original: ekena hetuna svasādhye sādhite punas tatraiva dharmiṇi tallakṣaṇasya [T. 363a.] tadviruddhārthasādhakasya
analyzed: ekena hetuna sva sādhye sādhite punar tatra eva dharmiṇi tad lakṣaṇasya t tad viruddha artha sādhakasya
pratihetoḥ sambhavaḥ śaṅkhyate
bhāvānām viruddha svabhāva dvaya ayogāt
viruddha dharma sādhaka sambhave ca tasya eva

original: svasādhyāvinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇato bhāvasiddhyayogād iti /
analyzed: sva sādhya avinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇataḥ bhāva siddhi ayogāt iti

original: syān matam -- yadi nāma prastutaḥ pratihetvasambhavo 'smābhir niścetum aśakyas tathāpy asambhavat pratihetutvaṃ vivakṣittaikasaṃkhyatvapratipāditaṃ  #
analyzed: syāt matam yadi nāma prastutaḥ smābhiḥ niścetum aśakyaḥ tathā api asambhavat prati hetu tvam
hetu lakṣaṇam kasmāt na bhavati

original: ity āha -- na hy aniścitātmanaḥ ityādi /
analyzed: iti āha na hi aniścita ātmanaḥ ityādi

original: pratipādako yo dharmo hetos tasyāniścitasvabhāvasya yasmāt tallakṣaṇatvaṃ pratipādakadharmatā na bhavati /
analyzed: pratipādakaḥ yaḥ dharmaḥ hetoḥ tasya aniścita svabhāvasya yasmāt tad lakṣaṇa tvam pratipādaka dharma tā na bhavati
yathā saṃdigdhasya pakṣa dharma tvasya iti pūrvakasya sādhanam

original: nāpi sandigdhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa hetur bhavatīti na kaściddhetur bhaved iti hetvabhāvo [S. 203b.] vā ity asya samarthanam /
analyzed: na api sandigdham lakṣaṇam yasya sa hetuḥ bhavati iti na kaścid hetuḥ bhavet iti vā iti asya samarthanam

original: tataś ca hetvābhāsās tato 'pi ity atrāpi yojitam iti /
analyzed: tatas ca hetvābhāsāḥ iti atra api yojitam iti

original: syān matam -- yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasyaiva pratihetubhāvāt ahetutvaṃ bhavatu,
analyzed: syāt matam yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasya eva pratihetu bhāvāt ahetu tvam bhavatu

original: yasya tu pratiyogī hetur na dṛśyate sa vastuta evāsambhavat pratihetuḥ /
analyzed: yasya tu pratiyogī hetuḥ na dṛśyate sa vastutas evā asambhavat pratihetuḥ

original: na hi tatra vastutaḥ pratihetusambhavaḥ śaṅkyate,
analyzed: na hi tatra vastutas prati hetu sambhavaḥ śaṅkyate

original: bādhakapratyayam antareṇa bādhāśaṅkāyā ayogāt / tad uktam --
analyzed: bādhaka pratyayam antareṇa bādhā śaṅkāyāḥ ayogāt tat uktam
bādhā jñāne tu anutpanne na āśaṅkā niṣpramāṇikā iti

original: {p. 215.1} ata āha -- tulye lakṣaṇe hi ityādi /
analyzed: atas āha tulye lakṣaṇe hi ityādi
śaṅyamāna pratihetunā tulyam lakṣaṇam darśana adarśana mātra nimitta avinābhāva rūpam yasya

original: tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ [T. 363b.] pratihetor bbādhakasya sambhava sa yeśām api
analyzed: tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ pratihetoḥ sambhava sa api

original: tattulyalakṣaṇānāṃ pratiyogī na dṛśyate teṣv api śaṅkāṃ pratihetusambhavaviṣayām utpādayati /
analyzed: tad tulya lakṣaṇānām pratiyogī na dṛśyate teṣu api śaṅkām prati hetu sambhava viṣayām utpādayati
kim kāraṇam
adṛṣṭa pratiyoginaḥ dṛṣṭa pratiyoginaḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt
na hi tasya itareṇa kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti
yatas tad sambhavaḥ na śaṅkyeta

original: puruṣaśaktivaikalyādinā tu tadadarśanaṃ[744]sambhāvyeteti kim ucyate `nāśaṅkā niḥpra(ṣpra)māṇikā` iti /
analyzed: puruṣa śakti vaikalya ādinā tu kim ucyate na āśaṅkā iti

original: atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvaniścāyako dṛṣṭapratihetor adṛṣṭapratiyogina iṣyate yataḥ pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkā 'stam upaiti /
analyzed: atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandha lakṣaṇaḥ vinābhāva niścāyakaḥ dṛṣṭa pratihetoḥ adṛṣṭa pratiyoginaḥ iṣyate yatas pratiyogi sambhava āśaṅkā stam upaiti

original: [S. 204a.] tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetor lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣaḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇam
kim kāraṇam

original: yatas tato viśeṣād dhetur ekāntena niścayena nirastapratipakṣas tathāvidhe dharmiṇi pratihetvasambhavāt
analyzed: yatas tatas viśeṣāt hetuḥ ekāntena niścayena nirasta pratipakṣaḥ tathāvidhe dharmiṇi prati hetu asambhavāt
sva sādhyam niścāyayati iti

original: yas tathāvidho na bhavati tadviśeṣavirahāt dṛṣṭapratihetuḥ so 'tallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: yaḥ tathāvidhaḥ na bhavati tad viśeṣa virahāt dṛṣṭa pratihetuḥ saḥ tad lakṣaṇaḥ na hetuḥ syāt

original: tathā ca yadi nāmā 'hetau pratihetur dṛṣṭo,
analyzed: tathā ca yadi nāmā hetau pratihetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
hetoḥ kim āyātam
yena tad nivṛttaye tatra eka saṃkhyā vivakśā kriyate

original: yathoktāvinābhāvavacanenaiva tannivṛtter ity āha -- tathāca hetau tadviśeṣayogini pratihetvasambhave sati vyarthā niṣprayojanam ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣeti
analyzed: yathā ukta avinābhāva vacanena eva tad nivṛtteḥ iti āha tathā ca hetau tad viśeṣa yogini prati hetu asambhave sati vyarthā niṣprayojanam eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā iti

original: [T. 364a.] yathoktaviśeṣāṅgīkaraṇe tallakṣaṇasya pratihetor asambhavāt kasyaikasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate?

analyzed: yatas sya kāryaka tvam syāt iti

original: viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaś ca hetvābhāsasya vyavacchedārtham ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā hetulakṣaṇe kriyate /
analyzed: viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ ca hetvābhāsasya vyavaccheda artham eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā hetu lakṣaṇe kriyate

original: vastuto 'sambhavat pratihetutvasiddhye ca pratibandhalakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetāv iṣyamāṇe viruddhāvyabhicāry api hetvābhāso na [S. 204b.] bhavati
analyzed: ca pratibandha lakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetau iṣyamāṇe viruddha avyabhicārī api hetvābhāsaḥ na bhavati
tatas vyavacchedya abhāvāt kim eka saṃkhyā vivakṣayā

original: iti darśayann āha -- ataḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇaviśeṣopagamāt viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo hetvābhāsasya yallakṣaṇaṃtad dhīyeta na sambhavet /
analyzed: iti darśayan āha atas pratibandha lakṣaṇa viśeṣa upagamāt viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ hetvābhāsasya yat lakṣaṇam tat dhīyeta na sambhavet
kim punar tad viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ lakṣaṇam
iti āha sva lakṣaṇe ityādi

original: hetor yadātmīyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadyuktayor hetvor {p. 216.1}ekatra dharmiṇi virodhena
analyzed: hetoḥ yat ātmīyam lakṣaṇam tad yuktayoḥ hetvoḥ dharmiṇi virodhena
paraspara viruddha sādhya sādhaka tvena upanipāte sati viruddha avyabhicāri iti viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ lakṣaṇam

original: na ca tat pratibandhāṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati /
analyzed: na ca tat pratibandha aṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati

original: na hi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratibandhavaty ekatra hetau kvaciddharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyas tallakṣaṇas tatraiva hetuḥ sambhavet,
analyzed: na hi tādātmya tad utpattibhyām sva sādhya pratibandhavati ekatra hetau kvacid dharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyaḥ tad lakṣaṇaḥ tatra eva hetuḥ sambhavet
viruddha dharma adhyāsasya bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetor dvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti /
analyzed: tad avyabhicāriṇaḥ hetoḥ dvitīyasya tatra kutas sambhava avakāśaḥ iti

original: nanu yadi tathāvidhaviśeṣasambhave [S. 205a.] sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate,
analyzed: nanu yadi tathāvidha viśeṣa sambhave sati viruddha avyabhicāri lakṣaṇam hīyate
eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā vā
tathā api nā eva hetu abhāva prasaṅgaḥ

original: tat kim uktaṃ hetvabhāvo vety ata āha -- na ca naiva tasya viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya,
analyzed: tat kim uktam hetu abhāvaḥ vā iti atas āha na ca nā eva tasya viśeṣasya pratibandha lakṣaṇasya
yatas sambhavat pratihetu tvam niścīyate

original: svarūpaṃ tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ nirddeśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathā 'smābhir nirdiṣṭaṃ ydrūpaṃ pratītya pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavāu  #
analyzed: svarūpam tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇam nirddeśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathā smābhiḥ nirdiṣṭam pratītya pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ sambhava asambhavau
utpaśyāmaḥ

original: yatra sa viśeṣo nāsti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpita āgamāśraye 'numāne /
analyzed: yatra sa viśeṣaḥ nā asti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpitaḥ āgama āśraye numāne

original: yatra tv asti sa viśeṣo vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne tatra pratiyogino 'sambhava iti
analyzed: yatra tu asti sa viśeṣaḥ vastu bala pravṛtte numāne tatra sambhavaḥ iti

original: yata evaṃ tasmān nāsty eva bhavatāṃ sa viśeṣaḥ -- bhavadbhir na jñāyata eva sa viśeṣa
analyzed: yatas evam tasmāt na asti eva bhavatām sa viśeṣaḥ bhavadbhiḥ na jñāyate eva sa viśeṣa

original: 1iti -- tasmāt[745]sarvatra yatrāpi pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatrāpi ṣāṅkyā pratiyogiviṣayayā bhavitavyam /
analyzed: iti   yatra api pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra api ṣāṅkyā pratiyogi viṣayayā bhavitavyam
tām eva śaṅkhām draḍhyan āha
dṛṣṭa pratihetoḥ api ityādi

original: yasyāpi [S. 205b.] hi pratihetur dṛṣṭas tasyāpi prāk pratiyogidarśanād itareṇa sarvakālam
analyzed: yasya api hi pratihetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasya api prāk pratiyogi darśanāt itareṇa sarvakālam

original: adṛṣṭapratiyoginā kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate [T. 365a.] yaddarśanāj jñāyeta `atra pratiyogī
analyzed: adṛṣṭa pratiyoginā kaścid viśeṣaḥ lakṣyate t yad darśanāt jñāyeta atra pratiyogī

original: sambhavati nyānyatra` iti darśanādarśanamātranibandhanayor anvayavyatirekayoḥ sarvatra samānatvāt /
analyzed: iti darśana adarśana mātra nibandhanayoḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ sarvatra samāna tvāt

original: tathāpi paścāt tatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra tattulyalakṣaṇe pratiyogisadbhāvaśaṅkā na vivarttata iti /
analyzed: tathā api paścāt tatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭaḥ iti sarvatra tad tulya lakṣaṇe pratiyogi sadbhāva śaṅkā na vivarttate iti

original: syān matam -- yeṣu pratiyogī sambhavati teṣvaśyam eva kadācid asāv upalabhyate /
analyzed: syāt matam yeṣu pratiyogī sambhavati teṣu aśyam eva kadācid asau upalabhyate

original: yeṣu tu puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi nopalabhyate trṣv asau {p. 217.1} nāsty eva /
analyzed: yeṣu tu puruṣa āyuṣeṇa api na upalabhyate asau na asti eva
tatas sa tathāvidhaḥ hetuḥ bhaviṣyati
tat katham hetu abhāvaḥ smākam

original: ity ata āha -- na ca ityādi /
analyzed: iti atas āha na ca ityādi

original: yeṣām api hi pratihetuḥ sambhavati teṣām api naiva sarvadā tasya pratihetor upalabdhiḥ pratipattṛṛṇām /
analyzed: yeṣām api hi pratihetuḥ sambhavati teṣām api nā eva sarvadā tasya pratihetoḥ upalabdhiḥ pratipattṛṇām

original: na hy asarvadarśinām upalabdhiḥ sarvabhāvasattāṃ vyāpnoti,
analyzed: na hi asarva darśinām upalabdhiḥ sarva bhāva sattām vyāpnoti
pratibandha vaikalya sadbhāvāt
nanu ca yatra sarvadā eva

original: pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra tadāśaṅkā [S. 206a.] kathaṃ kriyate? / tathā cāha --
analyzed: pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra tad āśaṅkā katham kriyate tathā ca āha
tu anutpanne na āśaṅkā niṣpramāṇikāḥ iti
tathā param
śiṣya paramparayā ā kumārila utpādāt prāk dṛṣṭa pratiyogiṣu upanyasteṣu

original: tenaiva prajñātiśayaśāktinā pratihetava utprekṣitāḥ tatas taddarśanāt yāvaj jīvaṃ adṛṣṭapratihetuṣv api tadāśaṅkā nivarttate /
analyzed: tena eva prajñā atiśaya śāktinā pratihetavaḥ utprekṣitāḥ tatas tad darśanāt yāvajjīvam adṛṣṭa pratihetuṣu api tad āśaṅkā nivarttate
tatas katham āśaṅkā niṣpramāṇikā ucyate

original: tulyalakṣaṇe hi ityādikam api pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkākāraṇam uktam eva /
analyzed: tulya lakṣaṇe hi ityādikam api pratiyogi sambhava āśaṅkā kāraṇam uktam eva

original: na ca pratiyogisambhavam āśaṅkamānas tannimittasaṃbhavāt `utprekṣeta hi` ityādyākrośamātrea nivarttayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca pratiyogi sambhavam āśaṅkamānaḥ tad nimitta saṃbhavāt utprekṣeta hi nivarttayitum śakyate
kiñcid kāraṇam abhidhānīyam yathā smābhiḥ

original: abhihitaṃ `svabhāvahetor viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavaśād ātmyaniścaye saty anvayavyatirekayos tatra nirṇaya;
analyzed: abhihitam svabhāva hetoḥ viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa vaśāt ātmya niścaye sati anvaya vyatirekayoḥ tatra nirṇaya

original: [S. 206b.] kāryahetau ca yathoktapratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kāryakāraṇasiddhes tanniścaya` iti /

original: yata evaṃ sarvatra pratiyogyāśaṅkā na nivarttate bhavad darśane tena kāraṇāniścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ sambhavayoḥ `iha pratiyogī sambhavati iha  #

original: jñānaṃ kim iti neśyate yato niścayo vijñānam eva tadviśeṣatvād asyeti /
analyzed: jñānam kim iti nā īśyate yatas niścayaḥ vijñānam eva tad viśeṣa tvāt asya iti

original: siddhāntavāy āha -- na na karttavyaṃ kintu kartavyam eva tasya [S. 210a.] niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanād anyārthatvāt /
analyzed: āha na na karttavyam kintu kartavyam eva tasya niścita grahaṇasya liṅga rūpa pratipādanāt anya artha tvāt

original: tām evānyārthatāṃ darśayann āha -- sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ ityādi /
analyzed: tām eva anya artha tām darśayan āha sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ ityādi

original: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetum icchanti /
analyzed: pare hi sapakṣe darśana mātreṇa a sapakṣe ca a darśana mātrataḥ gamakam hetum icchanti

original: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho hetur bhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: teṣām na eva darśana mātreṇa sādhya siddhau samarthaḥ hetuḥ bhavati iti jñāpana artham niścita grahaṇam kṛtam

original: yataḥ sator vidyamānayor api darśanādarśanayor agamakatvaṃ hetor dṛśyate `sa śyamaḥ,
analyzed: yatas satoḥ vidyamānayoḥ api darśana adarśanayoḥ agamaka tvam hetoḥ dṛśyate sa śyamaḥ
tad putra tvāt ityādau

original: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenā 'sapakṣe ca
analyzed: yatas evam tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatra abhāva viśiṣṭena ā sapakṣe ca

original: sarvatrābhāvena sapakṣe tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇabhāvaviśiṣṭena gamako hetur ity
analyzed: sarvatra abhāvena sapakṣe tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇa bhāva viśiṣṭena gamakaḥ hetuḥ iti

original: asyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇavākye niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyam /
analyzed: asya arthasya jñāpana artham lakṣaṇa vākye niścita grahaṇam kṛtam boddhavyam

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yāv eva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyām
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yau eva sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ bhāva abhāvau pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā niścitau tābhyām
eva hetuḥ gamakaḥ bhavati

original: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇety asyārthasya [S. 210b.] jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam iti /
analyzed: na tu yathā kathañcid darśana mātreṇa iti asya arthasya s jñāpanāya niścita grahaṇam kṛtam iti
prakṛtam upasaṃharan āha tena ityādi

original: yena viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayor eva khyāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam,
analyzed: yena viśiṣṭayoḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ eva khyāpanāya niścita grahaṇam kṛtam
na rūpa antara abhidhānāya
anātma rūpasya t ca lakṣaṇa tā na yujyate

original: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: tena para rūpam liṅgasya lakṣaṇam na bhavati

original: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kiñcid rūpaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyata iti /
analyzed: yatas tena jñāna ādinā para rūpeṇa liṅgasya na kiñcid rūpa viśeṣaḥ abhidhīyate iti

original: {p. 223.1} nanu ca pare 'pi sapakṣavipakṣayor bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ hetum icchanti,
analyzed: nanu ca pare pi sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ bhāva abhāvābhyām gamakam hetum icchanti
darśana adarśane tu tayoḥ eva sādhake
tat kim artham niścita grahaṇam

original: iti, ata āha -- tau hi ityādi /
analyzed: iti atas āha tau hi ityādi

original: yady api pare bhāvābhāvābhyām eva gamakaṃ hetum icchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eveti bhāvābhāvau darśanādarśanamātrato  #
analyzed: yadi api pare bhāva abhāvābhyām eva gamakam hetum icchanti tathā api sapakṣe eva sapakṣe ca abhāvaḥ eva iti bhāva abhāvau
vyavasthāpayanti

original: na ca tatas tau tathāvidhāu sidhyataḥ,
analyzed: na ca tatas tau tathāvidhau sidhyataḥ

original: pratibandhavikalānām apy athānāṃ kvacid bhāvābhāvayoḥ kathañciddarśanādarśanasambhavāt /
analyzed: pratibandha vikalānām api kvacid bhāva abhāvayoḥ kathañcid darśana adarśana sambhavāt

original: tasmād [S. 211a.] yau `hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evam ātmakau
analyzed: tasmāt s yau hetoḥ sapakṣe eva sapakṣe ca abhāve eva iti evam ātmakau

original: bhāvābhāvau tau tadbhāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṇ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ
analyzed: bhāva abhāvau tau tad bhāvasya sādhakam yat tādātmya tad utpatti sādhana viṣayam
tad vṛttyā boddhavyau
kutas upāya antarasya abhāvāt

original: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveśāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ
analyzed: tad anabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣaḥ eva bhāvaḥ sarva īśām hetumatām bhāvānām sādhyena anugama darśane sati vipakṣe ca abhāvaḥ eva sādhya vikalānām sarva arthānām
hetu viviktānām upalambhe sati syāt
na ca etat a sarva darśinaḥ sambhavati iti

original: yata upayāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayor viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣāṇe lakṣaṇakāeṇeti /
analyzed: yatas na asti tena kāraṇena tayoḥ viśiṣṭayoḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścita śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ lakṣāṇe lakṣaṇa kāeṇa iti

original: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrād eva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayor eva sattā na prasidhyed iti,
analyzed: nanu ca bhāva abhāva vacana mātrāt eva pramāṇataḥ niścayaḥ labhyate anyathā tayoḥ eva sattā na prasidhyet iti
atas āha yadi api ityādi
anumeye tad tulya sadbhāvaḥ nāstitā asati

original: ity anenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ [T. 370b.] bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇa niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayor bhāvābhāvayor yat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya  #
analyzed: iti anena eva sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ bhāva abhāva vacana mātreṇa niścita grahaṇa nirapekṣeṇa tayoḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ yat sādhanam pramāṇam tasya
vṛttiḥ yadi api ākṣipyate

original: kathaṃ punar niścitagrahaṇam antareṇa bhāvābhāvavacanamātratas tadvṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ?
analyzed: katham punar niścita grahaṇam antareṇa bhāva abhāva vacana mātrataḥ tad vṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ

original: ity āha -- anyathā yadi tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir nākṣipyeta,
analyzed: iti āha anyathā yadi tad sādhana pramāṇa vṛttiḥ na ākṣipyeta

original: [S. 211b.] tadā tayor eva sapakṣavipakṣayor eva bhāvābhāvayor yā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā aprasiddheḥ /
analyzed: tadā tayoḥ eva sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ eva bhāva abhāvayoḥ yā sattā svarūpa vyavasthā tasyāḥ aprasiddheḥ
kasmāt aprasiddhiḥ

original: ity āha -- jñānasya upalabdher yā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvāj jñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
analyzed: iti āha jñānasya upalabdheḥ yā sattā utpattiḥ tad nibandhana tvāt jñeyasya bhāva abhāva lakṣaṇasya sattā vyavasthāyāḥ svarūpa vyavasthiteḥ

original: na hy upalambham antareṇa svata evārthāḥ {p. 224.1} sidhyanti,
analyzed: na hi upalambham antareṇa svatas eva arthāḥ sidhyanti
sarvasya sarva siddhi prasaṅgāt

original: tasmād idam evaṃrūpaṃ naivaṃrūpam iti tadākārajñānodayād eva vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: tasmāt idam evaṃrūpam na evaṃrūpam iti tad ākāra jñāna udayāt eva vyavasthāpyate

original: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vinā 'pi tatsādhanaṃ
analyzed: yatas evam tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeya sattā vyavasthā eva niścita grahaṇam vinā tat sādhanam
tad sattā sādhanam pramāṇam ākarśati ākṣipati iti

original: kiñ ca, parārthatvāc ca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir ākṣipyata iti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca parārtha tvāt ca śāstra praṇayanasya tad sādhana pramāṇa vṛttiḥ ākṣipyate iti sambandhaḥ

original: kīdṛśaṃ punas tacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākṣipati?
analyzed: kīdṛśam punar tad śāstra praṇayanam yat parārtha rūpatayā sva vyavasthāpita jñeya sattā sādhanam pramāṇam ākṣipati
iti āha  vāñcitasya arthasya iti

original: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttim
analyzed: yadi nāma evaṃrūpam para artham śāstra praṇayanam tathā api katham tat sādhana pramāṇa vṛttim

original: ākṣipatīty āha -- tadrūpaṃ tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye
analyzed: ākṣipati iti āha tad rūpam tasya liṅgasya tri rūpasya rūpam svabhāvam śāstra uktam ye
pratipattāraḥ na vidanti

original: na teśāṃ tatas trirūpāl liṅgāc chāstroktād vāñcite 'rthe pravṛttir bhavati,
analyzed: na tatas tri rūpāt liṅgāt śāstra uktāt vāñcite rthe pravṛttiḥ bhavati
ajñātasya arthasya jñāpakasya sva sattā mātreṇa pravartaka tva abhāvāt

original: yata evam iti tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvād eva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvād eva pravarttake trirūpaliṅge jñānaṃ siddham iti yady api niścitagrahaṇam atiricyate  #
analyzed: yatas evam iti tasmāt para upalakṣaṇa tvāt eva pareṣām jñāpaka tvāt eva pravarttake trirūpa liṅge jñānam siddham iti yadi api niścita grahaṇam atiricyate
tathā api tau eva

original: liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayor bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau śastroktau `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evaṃrūpau kecinnaiyāyika prabhṛtayaḥ,
analyzed: liṅgasya sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ bhāva abhāvau viśiṣṭau śastra uktau sapakṣe eva sapakṣe ca abhāvaḥ eva iti evaṃrūpau kecid naiyāyika prabhṛtayaḥ

original: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa -- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ --
analyzed: pare darśana adarśana mātreṇa ye darśana adarśane pratibandha sādhake na bhavataḥ

original: tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti yata eva[770] iti tasmāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ niśedhārtho 'yaṃ
analyzed: tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti yatas iti tasmāt teṣām vādinām niśedha arthaḥ yam
lakṣaṇe niścita śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ ācāryeṇa asmābhiḥ ca abhyupagataḥ iti

original: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
analyzed: yadi tu para vipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā na eva asau prayujyeta iti

original: kim iti punar darśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviśayābhyāṃ sapakṣā[sa]pakśayoḥ viśiṣṭau
analyzed: kim iti punar darśana a darśanābhyām bhāva abhāva viśayābhyām sapakṣa asapakśayoḥ viśiṣṭau

original: bhāvābhāvāv anvayavyatirekātmakau [T. 371b.] neṣyeta ity āha -- sator api ityādi
analyzed: bhāva abhāvau anvaya vyatireka ātmakau iti āha satoḥ api ityādi

original: saty api kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvacic cāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane `sa śyamaḥ,
analyzed: sati api kvacid sapakṣe bhāva darśane hetoḥ kvacid ca a sapakṣe bhāva darśane sa śyamaḥ
tad putra tvāt ityādau anvaya vyatirekayoḥ saṃśayāt

original: tathā hi -- anvayo nāma sarvatra saty eva sādhye hetor {p. 225.1} bhāvo vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetor abhāvo vyatirekaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi anvayaḥ nāma sarvatra sati eva sādhye hetoḥ bhāvaḥ vyāptyā ca asati sādhye hetoḥ abhāvaḥ vyatirekaḥ

original: na ca kvacit sati sādhye [S. 212b.] hetor bhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
analyzed: na ca kvacid sati sādhye hetoḥ bhāva darśane tad mātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati
apratibaddha svabhāvānām sahabhāva niyamāḥ bhāvāt

original: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve saty abhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyam abhāvaḥ,
analyzed: tathā kvacid sādhya abhimatasya abhāve sati abhāva darśane hetoḥ sarvatra tad abhāve vaśyam abhāvaḥ
tasya tad nivṛttau niyamena nivṛtti abhāvāt

original: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārtham eva niścitagrahaṇaṃ
analyzed: tasmāt pratibandha prasādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā eva yathā uktau sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ bhāva abhāvau sidhyataḥ na anyathā iti vipratipatti nirāsa artham eva niścita grahaṇam

original: kṛtam ity upadarśayann āha -- tasmāt ityādi /
analyzed: kṛtam iti upadarśayan āha tasmāt ityādi

original: asmābhiḥ ityācāryakṛte niścitagrahaṇe 'nyatrāsmākam abhimatatvāt asmābhiḥ ity āha /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ iti ācārya kṛte niścita grahaṇe nyatra asmākam abhimata tvāt asmābhiḥ iti āha
tat evam vipratipatti nirāsa artham niścita grahaṇam

original: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tan na kartavyam eveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhāvatīti [T. 372a.] darśayann āha -- yato  #
analyzed: asatyām tu vipratipattau tat na kartavyam eva iti pratipādya atas eva nyāyāt jñāta tvam rūpa antaram na darśayan āha yatas
pi ityādi
pṛthak atas iti pakṣa dharma tva ādeḥ trairūpyāt
kutas

original: tenaiva trairūpyavacanenaiva tatsādhanapramāṇākṣepataḥ avagatatvāt pratipannatvād iti /
analyzed: tena eva trairūpya vacanena eva tad sādhana pramāṇa ākṣepataḥ avagata tvāt pratipanna tvāt iti
kiṃvat upanaya arthavat pakṣa dharma tvāt iti

original: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetor upanayasyārtho 'vagatas tasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
analyzed: yathā pakṣa dharma tva vacanena eva hetoḥ upanayasya arthaḥ vagataḥ tasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāva pradarśana ātmaka tvāt

original: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo [S. 213a.] rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
analyzed: pakṣa dharma vacanasya ca tad rūpa tvāt tatas rūpa antaram na bhavati
tathā trairūpyāt jñānam
tad vacanena eva avagata tvāt iti

original: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- anvayavyatirekayor api ityādi /
analyzed: atra paraḥ niṣṭam āpādayan āha anvaya vyatirekayoḥ api ityādi

original: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyāj jñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam hanta tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekāc  #
analyzed: yadi trairūpya vacanena eva sāmarthyāt jñānam labhyate iti tat tatas pṛthak na vaktavyam hanta tarhi anvayāt pṛthak vyatirekaḥ na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekāt  /
ca pṛthak anvayaḥ
kim kāraṇam

original: ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogād ubhayasya gateḥ /
analyzed: ekasya anvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogāt ubhayasya gateḥ
kṛtam ca tayoḥ pṛthak vacanam

original: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyam iti /
analyzed: tathā jñāta tvasya api trairūpyāt gamyamānasya api pṛthak vacanam karttavyam iti
siddhāntavādī āha na
hetoḥ ityādi
na anvaya vyatirekayoḥ na pṛthaktvam kintu bhinna rūpa tā eva

original: tathā hi -- anvayo hetoḥ {p. 226.1} sapakṣe bhāva ucyate,
analyzed: tathā hi anvayaḥ hetoḥ sapakṣe bhāvaḥ ucyate
vyatirekaḥ punar sapakṣe

original: na ca tau parasparam ākṣipataḥ [T. 372b.] parasparam antarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayor bhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tau parasparam ākṣipataḥ parasparam antarbhavataḥ vidhi pratiṣedha rūpayoḥ bhinna svabhāva tvāt

original: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ca yaḥ yatas bhinna svabhāvaḥ sa tatra antarbhūtaḥ yuktaḥ

original: nanu ca yady anvayavyatirekayor bhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trairūpaṃ liṅgam ucyate? /
analyzed: nanu ca yadi anvaya vyatirekayoḥ bhinna rūpa tā katham tarhi trairūpam liṅgam ucyate

original: na hi parasparabhinnāv ātmānāv evāsya yujyate,
analyzed: na hi paraspara bhinnau ātmānau eva asya yujyate
svabhāva bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt vastu bhedasya
na eṣa doṣaḥ

original: yato yathā 'nvayavyatirekau [S. 213b.] vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo(-pyete tathā tayo)
analyzed: yatas yathā nvaya vyatirekau vyavasthāpyete na vā nayā upyete tathā tayoḥ
R anantarbhāvaḥ ucyate na anyathā
katham ca etau vavasthāpyete
vyāvṛtti kṛtam bhedam upādāya
tathā ca anayoḥ bhinna rūpatā eva

original: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstīty ekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpam ity ucyata iti /
analyzed: vyāvṛtti bhede ca paramārthataḥ bhedaḥ na asti iti ekam liṅgam trirūpam iti ucyate iti

original: kathaṃ tarhi prāguktam[771]`nānayor arthaḥ kaścid bhedaḥ,
analyzed: katham tarhi arthaḥ kaścid bhedaḥ
anyatra prayoga bhedāt iti
atas āha ekaṃvākyam ityādi

original: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktam ekaṃ vākyam ubhayam anvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇam eva gamayatīty ucyate 'smābhir naiko 'rthaḥ  #
analyzed: anvaya mukhena vyatireka mukheṇa vā prayuktam ekam vākyam ubhayam anvayam vyatirekam ca bhinna lakṣaṇam eva gamayati iti ucyate smābhiḥ na ekaḥ rthaḥ
svabhāvaḥ dvitīyasya ucyate
paraspara bhinnayoḥ eva eka vākya artha rūpa tvāt
atra paras āha na tu nu
tatra eva ityādi

original: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- lakṣaṇavākyapratipāditāv anvayavyatirekāv āśritya parasparāntarbhāvaścodyate /
analyzed: ayam abhiprāyaḥ lakṣaṇa vākya pratipāditau anvaya vyatirekau āśritya paraspara antarbhāvaḥ codyate
sa ca

original: tathā hi -- `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ity atra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā[773]tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate;
analyzed: tathā hi tatra eva bhāvaḥ iti atra lakṣaṇa vākye bhāvaḥ gamyate
a tad abhāve vaśyam abhāvaḥ iti ca atra tad bhāve bhāvaḥ
na hi asati pratibandhe eka abhāve parasya abhāvaḥ

original: pratibandhaś ca tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eva /
analyzed: pratibandhaḥ ca tādātmya tad utpattibhyām tad bhāve bhāva rūpaḥ eva

original: tataś caikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣyor bhāvābhāvapratipādakena [S. 214a.] prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagater dvitīyavacanaṃ na karttavyam iti
analyzed: tatas ca ekena eva sapakṣa asapakṣyoḥ bhāva abhāva pratipādakena s prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇa vākyena ubhaya gateḥ dvitīya vacanam na karttavyam iti
tathā ca eka vākya artha antarbhāvāt bhinna svabhāva tā pi anayoḥ durllabhā

original: tataś ca yaduktam `anvayavyatirekayor api tarhi na pṛthaktvam iti` tat tadavastham eveti /
analyzed: tatas ca yat uktam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ api tarhi na pṛthaktvam iti tat tad avastham eva iti

original: {p. 227.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- vacanam etad `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ityādirūpam ubhayamākṣipati pratipādayati /
analyzed: siddhāntavādī āha vacanam etat tatra eva bhāvaḥ ityādi rūpam ubhayam ākṣipati pratipādayati
kutas
sāmarthyāt ubhaya pratipādana śaktasya

original: niyamas vyāpakasya `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` iti sāvadhāraṇasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt dvitīyapratipādananāntarīyakatvāt
analyzed: niyamaḥ vyāpakasya sapakṣe eva sapakṣe ca abhāvaḥ eva iti sa avadhāraṇasya dvitīya ākṣepa nāntarīyaka tvāt dvitīya pratipādana nāntarīyaka tvāt

original: na ca tāvataikavākyapratipādanamātreṇobhayor ekasvabhāvatā bhinnasvabhāvānām apy athānām ekavākyena pratipādanāt /
analyzed: na ca tāvatā eka vākya pratipādana mātreṇa ubhayoḥ eka svabhāva tā bhinna svabhāvānām api athānām eka vākyena pratipādanāt

original: ekenaiva ca lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagatāv api yat pṛthaabhidhānaṃ tat prayoganiyamārtham /
analyzed: ekena eva ca lakṣaṇa vākyena ubhaya gatau api yat tat prayoga niyama artham
sādharmya prayoge t
vacanam na karttavyam

original: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanam iti na punar ekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
analyzed: vaidharmya prayoge ca sādharmya vacanam iti na punar eka abhidhānena anavagatasya rūpa antarasya pratipādana artham

original: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ paropalakṣaṇāthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya  #
analyzed: na ca tathā trairūpya vacanena jñāna nibandhanena jñeya sattā vyavasthāyāḥ ca śāstra praṇayanena āśrita jñānasya eva trairūpyasya
pratipādanāt

original: labdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanam astīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktam iti /
analyzed: labdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcid prayojanam asti iti na asya pṛthagvacanam yuktam iti

original: syānmatam -- kevalāv api tarhy ekavākyārthānantarbhūtau parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau
analyzed: syāt matam kevalau api tarhi eka vākya artha anantarbhūtau parasparam abhinna svabhāvau

original: bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaikavākyārthāntarbhāvād ity ata āha -- na punaḥkevalau ekavākyārthānapekṣau
analyzed: bhaviṣyataḥ tatas eva eka vākya artha antarbhāvāt iti atas āha na punar kevalau eka vākya artha anapekṣau
tad antarbhāva mātreṇa sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ bhāva abhāvau parasparam ākṣipataḥ ntarbhavataḥ
bhinna rūpāṇām api arthānām eka vākya antarbhāva darśanāt

original: nanu ca niyamavantāv api bhāvābhāvau kevalāv eva,
analyzed: nanu ca niyamavantau api bhāva abhāvau kevalau eva

original: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayor api tatprasaṅga ity ata āha -- niyamavantau ca sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau na kevalau kintu sahitāv eva /
analyzed: tayoḥ paraspara ākṣepe kevalayoḥ api tad prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha niyamavantau ca sāvadhāraṇa vākya pratipāditau na kevalau kintu sahitau eva
kutas
niyamasya sāvadhāraṇasya vākyasya ubhaya rūpa tvāt bhāva abhāva pratipādana ātmaka tvāt

original: tad evaṃ sāvadharaṇena [T. 374a.] vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vā 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: tat evam sa avadharaṇena t vākyena nā eva kevalaḥ nvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā abhidhīyate

original: tadantarbhāvāt tu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparānantarbhūtāv eva sahitāv ekena vākyenābhidhīyeta
analyzed: tad antarbhāvāt tu dvitīya gatiḥ kintu paraspara an antarbhūtau eva sahitau ekena vākyena abhidhīyeta

original: iti pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatraiva [S. 215a.] sapakṣa eva bhāva {p.
analyzed: iti pratipādya upasaṃharan āha tasmāt tatra eva s sapakṣaḥ eva

original: 228.1} ity anena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /

kim tarhi
a sapakṣe bhāvaḥ pi

original: tathā cetareṇāpy asapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
analyzed: tathā ca itareṇa api a sapakṣe bhāvaḥ eva iti vacanena na abhāvaḥ eva kevalaḥ ucyate kintu sapakṣe

original: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyam ākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: yena kevala vacanena bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ vā tad ātmaka tayā dvitīyam ākṣipet yatas nayoḥ pṛthak vacanam na syāt

original: tasmād yadā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvāv abhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāv eveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
analyzed: tasmāt yadā nvaya vyatirekau bhāva abhāvau abhipretau tadā tau bhinna rūpau eva iti katham tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam

original: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyād evobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na karttavyam eva /
analyzed: atha niyamavatā vākyena abhihitau tadā eka vākyāt eva ubhaya gateḥ pṛthak vacanam na karttavyam eva

original: tat tu kṛtaṃ nāpratipannapratipattaye kintu prayoganiyamārtham ity uktam etad iti /
analyzed: tat tu kṛtam na apratipanna pratipattaye kintu prayoga niyama artham iti uktam etat iti

original: syānmatam -- yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataś ca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
analyzed: syāt matam yathā nvaya vyatirekau bhāva abhāva lakṣaṇau na paraspara ātmakau tatas ca tayoḥ parasparataḥ rūpa antara tvam

original: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśastrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
analyzed: evam para upalakṣaṇa śastra pratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyāt bhidyate eva jñānam

original: tato rūpāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [T. 374b.] āha -- naivam,
analyzed: tatas rūpa antaram bhaviṣyati iti āha na evam
yathā nvaya vyatirekau bhāva abhāva lakṣaṇau parasparam anantarbhūtau

kutas

original: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmād avyatirekād āgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye  #
analyzed: trairūpya viṣayām pratītim kāryante yena śāstreṇa tatas yat trailakṣaṇyam pratīyate āgṛhīta jñānam tasmāt avyatirekāt āgṛhīta jñāne trailakṣaṇye
ntarbhāvāt iti yāvat

original: iti tasmān na lakṣaṇāntaraṃ trairūpyād iti /

original: tad ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānam evocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtam iti
analyzed: tat ayam atra samudāya arthaḥ yadi jñāta tvam jñāna śabda pravṛtti nimittam uktena prakāreṇa jñānam eva ucyate tadā iti
na tad lakṣaṇam

original: athāvi(pi )jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvam ucyate tadā 'pi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ  #
analyzed: atha avipi jñāna apekṣaḥ karma bhāvaḥ jñāta tvam ucyate tadā pi jñeya sattā vyavasthāyāḥ jñāna sattā nibandhana tvāt trairūpya vyavasthā eva tad sattā vyavasthāpakam
jñānam ākṣipati

original: tatas tadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkarttavyam /
analyzed: tatas karma bhāvaḥ nu kta siddhaḥ iti na tad vacanam pṛthakkarttavyam
tathā para upalakṣaṇa artha śāstra pratipādita agṛhīta jñānāt trailakṣaṇyāt avyatirekāt iti

original: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayann āha -- tasmān na hetuḥṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ/
analyzed: tat evam abādhita viṣaya tva ādikam rūpa trayam nirākṛtya nigamayan āha tasmāt na hetuḥ ṣaṣ lakṣaṇaḥ
